Isabelle's Conjuration.baseFlair: I'm fighting. I know Kyle would never run away at a time like this—and neither would she. For me, that's reason enough to fight.
Isabelle's Conjuration.name: Isabelle's Conjuration
Isabelle's Conjuration.baseEffect: Put a random Runecraft follower from your deck into your hand.

Tetra's Mettle.baseFlair: I, too, will fight. I have abandoned lies and deception. Now all I have left is this shard of truth. And I've learned that the truth is priceless. I am prepared to risk everything to protect it.
Tetra's Mettle.name: Tetra's Mettle
Tetra's Mettle.baseEffect: Give your leader the following effect until the end of the turn: Whenever you play a Machina card, draw a card.

Ginger's Curse.baseFlair: "Love is naught but a fabrication."With her words, love itself perished from Ville de l'Amour.Nothing short of a miracle would return love to this place.—Ville de l'Amour, Spirits
Ginger's Curse.name: Ginger's Curse
Ginger's Curse.baseEffect: Change the cost of a follower in your hand to 1 and change its attack and defense to 1/1.

Spellbinder's Preparation.baseFlair: A spoon of elmwood, a jasper bowl of laraeya, and a silver throne... I'm not sure what's going to happen, but I haven't let any reagents go to waste.
Spellbinder's Preparation.name: Spellbinder's Preparation
Spellbinder's Preparation.baseEffect: Last Words: If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, summon a Guardian Golem.

Talisman Disciple.baseFlair: Onmyodo. It appears from within the shadows of history. During a certain emperor's reign, it becomes a popular form of fortune-telling in the capital.—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Pyo
Talisman Disciple.evoFlair: Nobles enjoy Onmyodo and come to use it in their everyday lives. It can make predictions concerning matters of the heart, epidemics, and even the course of battle.—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Toh
Talisman Disciple.name: Talisman Disciple
Talisman Disciple.baseEffect: Ward.Fanfare: Choose - Put a Paper Shikigami or Demonic Shikigami into your hand.

Snowman.baseFlair: Huh? Why am I wearing a scarf if I'm made of snow? Humph! Even snowmen get cold, you know!
Snowman.evoFlair: Huh? Why am I wearing clothes if I'm made of snow? Humph! Are snowmen not allowed to be interested in fashion now?
Snowman.name: Snowman

Scrap Golem.baseFlair: This haphazard pile of scrap metal moves with an ominous screech.
Scrap Golem.evoFlair: This mountain of scrap metal slays the foes of its master.
Scrap Golem.name: Scrap Golem

Flame Rat.baseFlair: Hey, no one told me I was gettin' turned into a rat! This makes me squeaking mad!
Flame Rat.evoFlair: Argh! What the squeak is going on? And why'd you have to make me look so ratty?
Flame Rat.name: Flame Rat
Flame Rat.baseEffect: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to both leaders.
Flame Rat.evoEffect: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to both leaders.

Bunnicorn Nic-nic.baseFlair: A divine beast summoned by a kind and talented Mysterian girl. During school hours, it can be occasionally seen freely roaming the halls of the academy.
Bunnicorn Nic-nic.evoFlair: One day, the young beast collected flowers around the academy to bring them to the girl, for this day was the one year anniversary of their union.
Bunnicorn Nic-nic.name: Bunnicorn Nic-nic
Bunnicorn Nic-nic.baseEffect: Last Words: Spellboost the cards in your hand.
Bunnicorn Nic-nic.evoEffect: Last Words: Spellboost the cards in your hand.

Juggling Moggy.baseFlair: Ladies and gentlemen, I give you the Nine of Wands, voice of caution. Open your eyes. Perk up your ears. The truth is right in front of you. Sharpen your senses, open your mind, and the impossible shall become possible.
Juggling Moggy.evoFlair: With deft paws and mental fortitude, the magic gems dance and twirl, forming shapes from which myriad enigmas abound. The moggy observes the crowd, waiting for just the right moment to dazzle them with the grand finale.
Juggling Moggy.name: Juggling Moggy
Juggling Moggy.baseEffect: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Gain +1/+1 and Last Words: Summon 2 Earth Essences.

Melvie, Princess Witch.baseFlair: Everyone loves a princess! Oh, to be a lovely princess... my beauty would drive any maiden green with envy. Maybe then I'll be able to get a little closer to them...
Melvie, Princess Witch.evoFlair: Ngh... Princesses aren't supposed to be spoilsports. To earn the people's love, you've gotta spread your own! So that's why I'm gonna find out what makes each and every person amazing!
Melvie, Princess Witch.name: Melvie, Princess Witch
Melvie, Princess Witch.baseEffect: Whenever you play a follower, gain +0/+1.
Melvie, Princess Witch.evoEffect: Whenever you play a follower, gain +0/+2.Whenever you play a spell, gain +2/+0.

Magical Augmentation.baseFlair: The experiment's a huge success. Wow, am I good, or am I good?—A Mage, in the Exploded Ruins of His Study
Magical Augmentation.name: Magical Augmentation
Magical Augmentation.baseEffect: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.Earth Rite (2): Deal 4 damage instead. Then draw 2 cards.

Crimson Sorcery.baseFlair: Dragons aren't the only ones who breathe fire when they're angry.
Crimson Sorcery.name: Crimson Sorcery

Mysterian Knowledge.baseFlair: "Can you believe this load of homework? What a monster!""Hang in there, Lou!"—Overheard at Mysteria Academy
Mysterian Knowledge.name: Mysterian Knowledge
Mysterian Knowledge.baseEffect: Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Mysterian Missile or Mysterian Circle.

Arcane Aether.baseFlair: The Mother bestows gifts upon her children.When the mages discovered her kindness in the laboratory, they saw a glistening, iridescent aether. They soon learned that it grants power to those who lust for the arcane.
Arcane Aether.name: Arcane Aether
Arcane Aether.baseEffect: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.If this is your fifth turn or later, recover 1 play point.Then, if this is your tenth turn or later, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower and then 2 damage to the enemy leader.

Grea's Ember.baseFlair: "Go any further and these flames will only get hotter." —Grea, Mysterian Dragoness
Grea's Ember.name: Grea's Ember
Grea's Ember.baseEffect: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.

Splendid Conjury.baseFlair: It's true that all flowers eventually wilt, but I bloom beyond the world's rules. Look now upon the eternal blossom and her spells of resplendence—for it is far more than you deserve!
Splendid Conjury.name: Splendid Conjury
Splendid Conjury.baseEffect: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.Spellboost: Deal 1 more.

Delta Cannon.baseFlair: Charging Delta Cannon... Fire. —Tetra, Sapphire Rebel
Delta Cannon.name: Delta Cannon
Delta Cannon.baseEffect: Deal 2 damage to an enemy.Give your leader the following effect: At the end of this turn, if at least 4 Machina cards were played this turn, put a Delta Cannon into your hand. (This effect is not stackable.)

Witch's Cauldron.baseFlair: Ingredients: black-tail lizard, firesnake powder, bat heart—Notes from a witch's notepadTo-do list: Get a new cauldron—Messy scribbling from a witch's notepad
Witch's Cauldron.name: Witch's Cauldron

Starseer's Telescope.baseFlair: The light of the stars is the light of the future. To know one is therefore to know both.
Starseer's Telescope.name: Starseer's Telescope
Starseer's Telescope.baseEffect: Fanfare: If another Earth Sigil amulet is in play, perform Earth Rite - Draw a card. Recover 1 play point.

Earth Essence.baseFlair: I daresay the fruits of my research should take my magical abilities to still greater heights!
Earth Essence.name: Earth Essence
Earth Essence.baseEffect: (This is an Earth Sigil amulet that can be used to activate Earth Rite effects.)

Mystic Rune.baseFlair: "There are a couple of things I wish to impart to you. But instead of giving you the usual lecture, allow me to show you this. Think you can understand it?" —Accomplished Mage
Mystic Rune.name: Mystic Rune
Mystic Rune.baseEffect: If you have at least 5 play points, Choose: Play this card as an Emergency Summoning or Reactive Barrier.

Sammy, Wizard's Apprentice.baseFlair: Come one, come all, and prepare to be amazed by the greatest magic show the world has ever seen! Be sure to tell your friends!
Sammy, Wizard's Apprentice.evoFlair: One, two, three—abracadabra! Well? What did you think? If you liked that trick, you'll love the next one!
Sammy, Wizard's Apprentice.name: Sammy, Wizard's Apprentice
Sammy, Wizard's Apprentice.baseEffect: Fanfare: Both players draw a card.

Penguin Wizard.baseFlair: This flightless bird has dedicated its life to magical study in hopes of one day soaring through the sky.
Penguin Wizard.evoFlair: Faithful that wings will sprout from his back, this flightless bird continues to dedicate its life to magical study
Penguin Wizard.name: Penguin Wizard
Penguin Wizard.baseEffect: Whenever you play a spell, gain +1/+0 until the end of the turn.
Penguin Wizard.evoEffect: Whenever you play a spell, gain +1/+0 until the end of the turn.

Crafty Warlock.baseFlair: Though the wizard himself might die, his knowledge is passed on to the next generation.
Crafty Warlock.evoFlair: Even should some evildoer reduce his body to ash, the knowledge he fostered will be passed down forever.
Crafty Warlock.name: Crafty Warlock
Crafty Warlock.baseEffect: Last Words: Summon an Earth Essence.
Crafty Warlock.evoEffect: Last Words: Summon an Earth Essence.

Apprentice Alchemist.baseFlair: Hmm... Either I botched the brew or this recipe is codswallop! Maybe a shard of dragonstone can rescue it.
Apprentice Alchemist.evoFlair: Arcane enigma! I've done it—an entirely new tincture! Failure truly is the mother of success.
Apprentice Alchemist.name: Apprentice Alchemist
Apprentice Alchemist.baseEffect: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Put a Conjure Guardian into your hand.

Craig, Wizard of Mysteria.baseFlair: The magic is spiraling out of control! Sorry, everyone! I could really use a little help here!
Craig, Wizard of Mysteria.evoFlair: There's no way I can stop the runaway magic on my own. But with all of you here, things will be okay! Fight alongside me, everyone!
Craig, Wizard of Mysteria.name: Craig, Wizard of Mysteria
Craig, Wizard of Mysteria.baseEffect: Fanfare: Spellboost a follower in your hand 2 times.

Witch of Sweets.baseFlair: A witch's treats must seem scary. You don't want to eat any, do you? But, still, these are my best work.
Witch of Sweets.evoFlair: Someday I'd like to open a shop of my own. That's why I make treats like this every day. Even we witches have dreams in our hearts.
Witch of Sweets.name: Witch of Sweets
Witch of Sweets.baseEffect: Fanfare: Draw a card if the number of Neutral cards in your hand equals or exceeds the number of Runecraft cards in your hand (excluding this card).

Carbuncle of Mysteria.baseFlair: A mystical critter found in the emerald-green woods and gardens of Mysteria Academy. The enchanted gem in its forehead emits energy to nourish the greenery.
Carbuncle of Mysteria.evoFlair: This mystical critter has an important role in the early spring. It releases the magical energy it stored up during winter to create a flower garden for incoming students.
Carbuncle of Mysteria.name: Carbuncle of Mysteria
Carbuncle of Mysteria.baseEffect: Last Words: Spellboost the cards in your hand.
Carbuncle of Mysteria.evoEffect: Last Words: Spellboost the cards in your hand.

Magic Owl.baseFlair: You shouldn't treat familiars as if they were simple servants. They are irreplaceable companions deserving of trust. They are the rescuers of lonely old magicians, saving them from a life of solitude. —Familiars: An Introduction, Chapter 1
Magic Owl.evoFlair: Do not depend on their devotion, for that is not their purpose. To truly be a good fit for your familiar, you must work to improve yourself. Only then will your familiar's power increase. And wouldn't that be handy? —Familiars: An Introduction, Chapter 6
Magic Owl.name: Magic Owl
Magic Owl.evoEffect: Evolve: Spellboost the cards in your hand 2 times.

Mr. Bertrand, Magic Mentor.baseFlair: Welcome, promising wizards and witches of the future, to Mysteria. Here, you will unravel the secrets to sorcery—I will do my best to guide you on this journey.
Mr. Bertrand, Magic Mentor.evoFlair: An explosion outside, you say? Ah, that must be Ms. Miranda. Just like when she was a student... Some things never change.
Mr. Bertrand, Magic Mentor.name: Mr. Bertrand, Magic Mentor
Mr. Bertrand, Magic Mentor.baseEffect: Last Words: If you have played another Mysteria card this turn, randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Mysterian Missile or Mysterian Circle.
Mr. Bertrand, Magic Mentor.evoEffect: Last Words: If you have played another Mysteria card this turn, randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Mysterian Missile or Mysterian Circle.

Witch of Foresight.baseFlair: The future's just like, phew! Nobody can be sure what'll happen, so it can't be put into words. But I'll bet your future is, like, fwoosh and brrrr!
Witch of Foresight.evoFlair: Your future's going to be all fwoosh and brrrr! Huh, don't you understand? Then hold on for a moment! I'll burn you—fwoosh—and freeze you—brrrr!
Witch of Foresight.name: Witch of Foresight
Witch of Foresight.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put a random spell from your deck into your hand.

Beastfaced Mage.baseFlair: It's been years and years since I started learning magic. One day before I knew it, I was standing on two legs! Who knows, I might become human before long!
Beastfaced Mage.evoFlair: It's been years and years since I started learning magic. I'm still not a real mage, but someday I'll tell that girl just how I feel!
Beastfaced Mage.name: Beastfaced Mage
Beastfaced Mage.baseEffect: Clash: Put an Earth Essence into your hand.

Black Witch Anna.baseFlair: "Howdy! Pleasure to meetcha!""You guys are real... Right?"
Black Witch Anna.evoFlair: "I'm not sure if I'll ever be as good as her... But one day I want to be a great witch, just like Grandmother.""That's the spirit, Anna!""But then again... it's too bright to go outside..."
Black Witch Anna.name: Black Witch Anna
Black Witch Anna.baseEffect: Last Words: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
Black Witch Anna.evoEffect: Last Words: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.

Owen, Knight of Mysteria.baseFlair: Right now I'm not a knight—I'm just another student of Mysteria Academy. So I'll study magic like a good pupil... while I watch over the princess from the shadows.
Owen, Knight of Mysteria.evoFlair: If anything threatens the princess, I'll use all my knowledge and strength to defend her. With my enchanted blade, I can slice through any spell... Just try and stop me!
Owen, Knight of Mysteria.name: Owen, Knight of Mysteria
Owen, Knight of Mysteria.baseEffect: Fanfare: Randomly put a Mysteria follower (excluding Owen, Knight of Mysteria) from your deck into your hand.

Rabbit Mage.baseFlair: A little heresy is imperative to sorcery, wouldn't you say? Listen, rabbit, the gift of speech is nothing to sniff at. You may have lost your colony, but you've gained incredible wisdom. —A fickle wizard
Rabbit Mage.evoFlair: Sorcery is the way of righteousness—as long as you use your gift in the name of good, magic will always be your ally. So go on, then. Return to your colony with your newfound insight. —A fickle wizard
Rabbit Mage.name: Rabbit Mage
Rabbit Mage.baseEffect: Fanfare: If there are no allied Earth Sigil amulets in play, summon an Earth Essence.

Shirati, Mysterian Mogul.baseFlair: Wahahaha! Ladies and gentlemen of Mysteria! Bask in my wealthy glory! I have no need for greetings—I give you my loose coins instead! Cayman! Ready my treasure so that I might shower it upon these plebes!
Shirati, Mysterian Mogul.evoFlair: I was born to stand above all others! No matter where I go, I'm always number one! Cayman! Ready my handkerchief, as I have moved myself to tears!
Shirati, Mysterian Mogul.name: Shirati, Mysterian Mogul
Shirati, Mysterian Mogul.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put a Cayman, Mysterian Butler into your hand.

Jetbroom Witch.baseFlair: Core mutations have led to one new discovery after another. Rather than grow one's magical capabilities, there are now methods to improve magical efficiency... much to the dismay of a mechastaff sorcerer. —Research Archives of the Sorcerer's Guild, Vol. I
Jetbroom Witch.evoFlair: I mean, yeah, it's full of magical energy and whatever, but... Mine doesn't need to only work, it's gotta be efficient! See this? I only need an ounce of magic to get it working!—Jetbroom Witch to Mechastaff Sorcerer
Jetbroom Witch.name: Jetbroom Witch
Jetbroom Witch.baseEffect: Fanfare: Choose - Put an Assembly Droid or Repair Mode into your hand.

Electrokitty.baseFlair: They sparkle and glimmer ever so quickly... Enough to catch the eye of any cat. The sparks of the battlefield are just another plaything for that one.  —Lightning Shooter
Electrokitty.evoFlair: Such a sparky, fluffy tail—and that adorable purr... Oh, I just can't! It's so cute, I could just go numb! You know what? I'm gonna hug it!—Lightning Shooter
Electrokitty.name: Electrokitty
Electrokitty.baseEffect: Fanfare: If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, deal 2 damage to an enemy.

Geoelementist.baseFlair: O still and stable earth. Foundation of matter and author of gravity. Cardinal direction: North. Domain of the Gnomes. You who chill and dry... Please, tell me. Will I be as strong and steadfast as you one day?
Geoelementist.evoFlair: O still and stable earth. Foundation of matter and author of gravity. Cardinal direction: North. Domain of the Gnomes. You who chill and dry... Please... Give me the strength to withstand and endure, just as you do!
Geoelementist.name: Geoelementist
Geoelementist.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand. If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, gain +2/+2.

Gigahand Golem.baseFlair: Chief: Recurrence of uncontrolled behavior confirmed.Manager: It's acting strange. Further experimentation required.Trainee: What's with those weird poses it strikes?—Records from a certain lab
Gigahand Golem.evoFlair: Chief: Is this an incentive-related complication?Manager: It's looking at us. Does it want something?Trainee: Do you think... it just wants us to say "good job"?—Records from a certain lab
Gigahand Golem.name: Gigahand Golem
Gigahand Golem.baseEffect: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Gain Rush and summon a Scrap Golem.Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +4/+4.

Aeroelementalist.baseFlair: O volatile and fickle wind. Master of gentle endurance and change. Cardinal direction: East. Domain of the Sylphs. You who heat and dampen. Yours is a fine zephyr that brings windfalls aplenty... and I'll gladly gather them up.
Aeroelementalist.evoFlair: O volatile and fickle wind. Master of gentle endurance and change. Cardinal direction: East. Domain of the Sylphs. You who heat and dampen. The winds of fortune will bring me riches... I'll blow all my business rivals away.
Aeroelementalist.name: Aeroelementalist
Aeroelementalist.baseEffect: Rush.Fanfare: Randomly put a copy of an allied amulet destroyed this match into your hand. If the amulet is a Naterran Great Tree, gain +2/+2.

Charming Gentlemouse.baseFlair: Heh... Have you perhaps been charmed by my flame? This blaze and I are much the same, you know... If you get too close, you might get burned. Squeak!
Charming Gentlemouse.evoFlair: Heh... I dedicate this light to you. This flare is much like you, you know... radiant and dazzling. Squeak!
Charming Gentlemouse.name: Charming Gentlemouse
Charming Gentlemouse.baseEffect: Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Summon a Charming Gentlemouse. Give +1/+1 to all allied Charming Gentlemice.Enhance (8) - Summon 2 and give +2/+2 instead.Enhance (10) - Summon 3 and give +3/+3 instead.

Device Diviner.baseFlair: The source of the core's metamorphosis was discovered during magitech research. The resulting tool was capable of predicting detailed fortunes. This type of magical analysis and recursion wouldn't be possible without the boon of technology. —Magical Research Report
Device Diviner.evoFlair: The reason we incorporated technology into our spells was to grasp the manifold possibilities of magic. By breaking down the world into its constituent elements, we become capable of anything. And modern technique is to thank for this miracle. —On Amplification
Device Diviner.name: Device Diviner
Device Diviner.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put a Repair Mode into your hand.
Device Diviner.evoEffect: Evolve: Change the cost of a random Repair Mode in your hand to 0.

Creative Conjurer.baseFlair: The Magician's raison d'être lies in creation. A flash of an idea sets ablaze the imagination, and the imagination constructs plans to set everything in motion. These inspired works of pride draw the eye and captivate the senses.
Creative Conjurer.evoFlair: The Magician is a vessel from which creation flows. Driven by the inexhaustible imperative for improvement, nothing can contain his conviction. He creates; therefore he is.
Creative Conjurer.name: Creative Conjurer
Creative Conjurer.baseEffect: Fanfare: If there are no allied Earth Sigil amulets in play, summon an Earth Essence. Otherwise, perform Earth Rite: Put a Golem Summoning into your hand.

Cayman, Mysterian Butler.baseFlair: You called for me, my lord? For you to choose to interact with the plebeians beneath you, your heart is even broader than the ocean... You never fail to impress me. Here you are. Scatter these gold coins to your heart's content.
Cayman, Mysterian Butler.evoFlair: Lord Shirati used to be so small, but now he has grown enough to scatter all those gold coins... It's too bright a sight for these old eyes. I vow to serve him until the end of my days.
Cayman, Mysterian Butler.name: Cayman, Mysterian Butler
Cayman, Mysterian Butler.baseEffect: Fanfare: Restore 2 defense to your leader.

Paper Shikigami.baseFlair: One, two, three, four. Voices echo in spite of themselves. The object housing a god stands on its own. Truly mysterious.—A Guide to Onmyodo: Introduction
Paper Shikigami.evoFlair: Onmyodo, a momentous curse. Terrifying, without a doubt. A tiny shikigami, like a child. The sight of it hard at work is truly precious.—A Guide to Onmyodo: Introduction
Paper Shikigami.name: Paper Shikigami
Paper Shikigami.baseEffect: Last Words: Spellboost the cards in your hand.

Scholarly Witch.baseFlair: My circles can decipher the building blocks of life. Would you like to know the definition of beauty?
Scholarly Witch.evoFlair: Analysis leads to a greater appreciation of the world. Open your eyes, and I'll show you everything you've ever wanted to see.
Scholarly Witch.name: Scholarly Witch

Dwarf Alchemist.baseFlair: Diminutive in appearance, slight of build, and a keeper of limitless knowledge.
Dwarf Alchemist.evoFlair: Diminutive in appearance, slight of build, and an endless wellspring of hidden arts.
Dwarf Alchemist.name: Dwarf Alchemist
Dwarf Alchemist.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put an Earth Essence into your hand.
Dwarf Alchemist.evoEffect: Evolve: Put a random card with Earth Rite from your deck into your hand.

Freshman Lou.baseFlair: Um, which way was the school again? This way? That way? The other way? Oh no, I'm gonna be late!
Freshman Lou.evoFlair: I did it! I made it to school. Now watch me turn into a master sorceress. Fun spells, scary spells—I'm going to learn them all!
Freshman Lou.name: Freshman Lou
Freshman Lou.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put a random card with Spellboost from your deck into your hand.

Magic Illusionist.baseFlair: There are indeed tricks to my magic, but that doesn't mean anyone will be able to figure them out! Now behold as I reveal to you the rarely seen and horrific mysteries of immortality!
Magic Illusionist.evoFlair: No matter how many times you freeze me, burn me, cut me, pierce me, or crush me, I shall only reappear in all my glory—at least until you finally figure out the trick.
Magic Illusionist.name: Magic Illusionist
Magic Illusionist.baseEffect: Last Words: Earth Rite - Summon a Magic Illusionist.
Magic Illusionist.evoEffect: Last Words: Earth Rite - Summon an unevolved Magic Illusionist.

Mysterian Wyrmist.baseFlair: Mysteria... This really takes me back. Not a thing's changed. Not the students' passion for studying magic... And not you shadowy fools who dare to enter without permission.
Mysterian Wyrmist.evoFlair: I won't let you run roughshod over the young ones' future. Never. Flee the academy while I am still me!
Mysterian Wyrmist.name: Mysterian Wyrmist
Mysterian Wyrmist.baseEffect: If you have at least 6 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Mysterian Whitewyrm or Mysterian Blackwyrm.

Mechanized Lifeform.baseFlair: The magic researchers' latest experiment was a success. We were able to create a metal pseudo-lifeform that moves on its own. A minimal amount of mana allows it to act alongside its fellow machines, leading to increased output. —Mage Association Research Report, Part 2
Mechanized Lifeform.evoFlair: The magical lifeform turned out splendidly thanks to the help of a strange machine. But a portion of mages objected against incorporating technology with magic. I imagine it will prove quite difficult to change their minds. —Comment about Magical Technology 2
Mechanized Lifeform.name: Mechanized Lifeform
Mechanized Lifeform.baseEffect: Whenever you play another Machina card, draw a card.

Earth Sorceress.baseFlair: O still and stable earth. Foundation of matter and author of gravity. The essence of earth and wind is the very essence of the land itself. There's no load too heavy for it to bear... Wow.—Geoelementist
Earth Sorceress.evoFlair: The rain that should fall does not fall; the sun that should shine does not shine. This world is warped and its power fleeting. Our old ways have become putrefied by the new.—Magica Principia, Part 2
Earth Sorceress.name: Earth Sorceress
Earth Sorceress.baseEffect: Fanfare: Draw X cards. X equals the number of allied amulets in play.

Vergewalker Magician.baseFlair: No, no, I don't want any goody-goody opponent! It's not that I'm dark-hearted, I just want someone who will give it their all! Not that I plan on losing, of course.
Vergewalker Magician.evoFlair: Ahh! Now this is more like it! A devilishly fun bout between two upstanding fellows! Just don't cry when I unleash my dark power!
Vergewalker Magician.name: Vergewalker Magician
Vergewalker Magician.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put an Earth Essence into your hand.
Vergewalker Magician.evoEffect: Evolve: Earth Rite - Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.Earth Rite (2) - Deal 4 damage instead.

Timeworn Mage Levi.baseFlair: Think I'm an old fool, you little whippersnapper? Well, you're right... I'm an ancient mage, and miserable to boot!
Timeworn Mage Levi.evoFlair: I guess I'm getting a little too old for this, but I can at least go out with a bang. Ahem... Brace yourselves, villains!
Timeworn Mage Levi.name: Timeworn Mage Levi
Timeworn Mage Levi.evoEffect: Evolve: Put a Crimson Sorcery into your hand.

Apostle of Truth.baseFlair: Our way is truth. Yours is deception. Your true nature flutters in the depths of your soul. Call to it, release it, and achieve your purpose in life. Only then will the truth be revealed to you.
Apostle of Truth.evoFlair: The Third Rite: Understand TruthTruth: the original desire. To act in accordance with this urge is but a law of life.—Teachings of the Assembly of Truth
Apostle of Truth.name: Apostle of Truth
Apostle of Truth.baseEffect: Fanfare: Discard a card with Spellboost from your hand. Then put a random card with Spellboost that originally costs more than the discarded card from your deck into your hand and Spellboost it X times. X equals the number of times the discarded card had been Spellboosted.

Snow Knight.baseFlair: A dauntless snowman knight who sprang forth from the king of snowmen. To warm up the ever chilly monarch, he rubs the king's back.
Snow Knight.evoFlair: Since it serves as a bodyguard for the king, this knight wears armor. His one fault is that when warming up the king, his spear occasionally pokes the monarch in the rear.
Snow Knight.name: Snow Knight

Wild Snowman.baseFlair: A dastardly snowman knight who sprang forth from the king of snowmen. To warm up the ever chilly monarch, he steals clothes from passersby.
Wild Snowman.evoFlair: Since he leads the way for the king, this warrior has grown to tremendous proportions. His one fault is that, not understanding his own power, he accidentally tears the clothes he steals.
Wild Snowman.name: Wild Snowman

Onion Patch.baseFlair: Heretical life-forms created by a mage. They gather, shout, and plot in secret to destroy the world. "Bwa-ha-ha! Yay!"
Onion Patch.evoFlair: The world's destruction, the world's end. To the onions, its meaning is a mystery. They only wish to see the heartfelt smile of the mage who is their mother.
Onion Patch.name: Onion Patch
Onion Patch.baseEffect: Strike: Spellboost the cards in your hand.

Anne's Summoning.baseFlair: When the spellweaver's incantation echoes, a great spirit answers her summons."O, spirit of war! Heed my call!"
Anne's Summoning.evoFlair: The great spirit is faithful to his mistress, protecting her from all of her foes."Okay, spirit buddy! Give 'em everything you've got!"
Anne's Summoning.name: Anne's Summoning
Anne's Summoning.baseEffect: Rush.Ward.At the end of your opponent's turn, banish this follower.

Star Reader Stella.baseFlair: Do you know about stars' power? They shine, shine and glitter, glitter! Anywhoodle, if you watch the stars twinkle at night, you'll grow to love 'em for sure!
Star Reader Stella.evoFlair: Starlight has a lot of magical power, you know! You just take it like this and—bam! Uh-oh! Whoopsie doodles! Sometimes I overdo it. Haha!
Star Reader Stella.name: Star Reader Stella
Star Reader Stella.baseEffect: At the end of your turn, randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Venus, Pollux, Star Phoenix, Castor, Scorpius, or Andromeda.
Star Reader Stella.evoEffect: At the end of your turn, randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Venus, Pollux, Star Phoenix, Castor, Scorpius, or Andromeda.

Geos, Runehammer.baseFlair: "Back in my prime, we'd already be finished... Can't believe how long it's takin' me to cast spells these days.""Taking on all of us on his own? That old coot's lost it!"—Geos, Runehammer and an enemy officer
Geos, Runehammer.evoFlair: "Yeesh! I must be gettin' old if it's takin' me this long to crush a quick thousand!" "Just what the hell is that hamme—ooargh!" —Geos, Runehammer and an unfortunate soul
Geos, Runehammer.name: Geos, Runehammer
Geos, Runehammer.evoEffect: Bane.Evolve: Reveal a random Runecraft spell without Spellboost from your deck and put it into your hand. Gain +X/+X. X equals the original cost of that spell.

Solomon, Lord of Magic.baseFlair: There is a ring on his finger, a great ring that rules over all creation. The brass of this ring of wisdom commands the heavens, while the iron commands the earth. The king's name is Solomon, the founder of magic. —The Founding Mage, Prologue
Solomon, Lord of Magic.evoFlair: And so God asked the king who bore fate on his shoulders: What is your wish? What is your desire? The king replied with one single word: Wisdom. Great wisdom, previously unknown to man. —The Founding Mage, Final Act
Solomon, Lord of Magic.name: Solomon, Lord of Magic
Solomon, Lord of Magic.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put a Seal of Solomon into your hand and subtract X from its cost. X equals the number of times this card has been Spellboosted.

Uhlein, Grand Magus.baseFlair: Earth, fire, air, water—these are the four elements that combine to form our world. But within the eternal ebb of time, it seems humanity has forgotten its place. Heed these words: do not abandon old friends. For we are all threads in the fabric of the universe.
Uhlein, Grand Magus.evoFlair: The artificial beast seeks out new enemies as a matter of function. It then coldly calculates the difference between itself and its target, devoid of mind or purpose. The struggle between the old ways and the new has begun.
Uhlein, Grand Magus.name: Uhlein, Grand Magus
Uhlein, Grand Magus.baseEffect: Each turn, when you play an amulet for:-The first time, gain +1/+1. -The second time, draw a card.-The third time, deal 3 damage to all enemies.

0. Lhynkal, The Fool.baseFlair: Turn the first page, the journey begins. I am The Fool, mirror of *. Come, ** pactbearer, take my hand—on the adventure ahead, two heads are better than one.
0. Lhynkal, The Fool.evoFlair: Pact thrice affirmed, we set out. What is adventure but a sort of ***? When you have overcome the four trials, all will become ****. And then what will you do, pactbearer?
0. Lhynkal, The Fool.name: 0. Lhynkal, The Fool
0. Lhynkal, The Fool.baseEffect: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Rite of the Ignorant or Scourge of the Omniscient into your hand.

Magic Missile.baseFlair: I weave, I fire, I weave again.
Magic Missile.name: Magic Missile
Magic Missile.baseEffect: Deal 1 damage to an enemy.Draw a card.

Conjure Golem.baseFlair: Truth, take living form. Move through this world until you must die.
Conjure Golem.name: Conjure Golem

Wind Blast.baseFlair: It starts as just a gentle breeze. Then before they notice, fwoosh!
Wind Blast.name: Wind Blast
Wind Blast.baseEffect: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.Spellboost: Deal 1 more.

Kaleidoscopic Glow.baseFlair: The rainbow's shine catches the eye and leads you astray.
Kaleidoscopic Glow.name: Kaleidoscopic Glow
Kaleidoscopic Glow.baseEffect: Return a card that costs 2 play points or less to the player's hand.Draw a card.

Grand Spire.baseFlair: The heavens and earth were rent asunder long before the age of sorcery.
Grand Spire.name: Grand Spire
Grand Spire.baseEffect: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.Earth Rite: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower instead, and deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.

Witch Snap.baseFlair: Here, take this offering... Or perhaps I should say, this evaluation.
Witch Snap.name: Witch Snap
Witch Snap.baseEffect: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.Put an Earth Essence into your hand.

Mysterian Wisdom.baseFlair: The road to magical accomplishment is a long one. The first step is what people call "wisdom."—Mysteria, Magic Founder
Mysterian Wisdom.name: Mysterian Wisdom
Mysterian Wisdom.baseEffect: Banish a card from your hand and put a copy of that card into your deck.Put a Mysterian Missile and Mysterian Circle into your hand.

Shikigami Summons.baseFlair: Onmyodo—the way of yin and yang. A momentous curse descended from an ancient era. Without knowing who created it, or how it came to be, the people continue to pass it along.—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Rin
Shikigami Summons.name: Shikigami Summons
Shikigami Summons.baseEffect: Summon a Paper Shikigami.If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, summon a Demonic Shikigami instead.

Conjure Guardian.baseFlair: A faithful shield to the end, it will guard its master until nothing is left of their body.
Conjure Guardian.name: Conjure Guardian

Veridic Ritual.baseFlair: Knowledge is meaningless without execution. Put your knowledge to the test. With a strong foundation of study and practice, the truth will reveal itself. —The Secrets to Sorcery, Preface
Veridic Ritual.name: Veridic Ritual
Veridic Ritual.baseEffect: Deal 3 damage to an enemy.Earth Rite: Draw a card.

Mysterian Missile.baseFlair: Just gotta cast it like how the professor explained... Aw, shoot! I forgot to take notes! How am I gonna become a great wizard at this rate? —Male student, overheard at Mysteria Academy
Mysterian Missile.name: Mysterian Missile
Mysterian Missile.baseEffect: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.

Mysterian Circle.baseFlair: If you cast it like how the professor explained, it should work... Oh, drat! I'm too nervous. How am I gonna become a great witch at this rate? —Female student, overheard at Mysteria Academy
Mysterian Circle.name: Mysterian Circle
Mysterian Circle.baseEffect: Summon a Clay Golem. Give Ward to allied Clay Golems.

Golem Summoning.baseFlair: A golem is a sorcerous shield that faithfully protects its creator, and a spear that pierces through falsehoods to find the truth.
Golem Summoning.name: Golem Summoning
Golem Summoning.baseEffect: Summon a Guardian Golem.If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, evolve it.

Authoring Tomorrow.baseFlair: I'm not just writing predictions for the future. I'm deciding the future.
Authoring Tomorrow.name: Authoring Tomorrow
Authoring Tomorrow.baseEffect: Give your leader the following effect: At the end of your turn, if it is your second, fourth, sixth, or eighth turn, deal 1 damage to all enemy followers. If it is your third, fifth, seventh, or ninth turn, draw a card. If it is your tenth turn or later, deal 5 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect is not stackable and is removed after activating 3 times.)

Golem Assault.baseFlair: God made man in his image; man made golems in God's image.
Golem Assault.name: Golem Assault
Golem Assault.baseEffect: Put a Conjure Guardian into your hand.Enhance (6): Put 2 more into your hand.Earth Rite: Subtract 1 from the cost of all Conjure Guardians in your hand.

Chain of Calling.baseFlair: "Do your best and let the heavens do the rest." What stupidity, what foolishness. Fate does not hold the reigns of life; you do.
Chain of Calling.name: Chain of Calling
Chain of Calling.baseEffect: Put a random Runecraft follower from your deck into your hand.

Presto Chango.baseFlair: What's the difference between magic and an illusion? I guess it all comes down to whether or not it makes the audience smile. —Words of a retired magician
Presto Chango.name: Presto Chango
Presto Chango.baseEffect: Transform an enemy follower or amulet into a Joycrafter Sammy.

The Mysterian Project.baseFlair: Mysteria Academy has seen a huge increase in student matriculation lately. Fresh blood, transfers—even former dropouts are getting a second chance.
The Mysterian Project.name: The Mysterian Project
The Mysterian Project.baseEffect: Select a follower in your hand and put a copy of it into your hand.

Sorcery in Solidarity.baseFlair: Do we have a right to resist our creator? Can we even put up such a fight? The fearful lies start raining down."The heart yearns. The heart wanders. But in doing so, it becomes stronger."
Sorcery in Solidarity.name: Sorcery in Solidarity
Sorcery in Solidarity.baseEffect: Choose: Use play points equal to this card's cost and play this card as an Isabelle's Conjuration or Tetra's Mettle.If this card has been Spellboosted at least 5 times, instead put a random Runecraft follower from your deck into your hand and give your leader the following effect until the end of the turn: Whenever you play a Machina card, draw a card.

Madcap Conjuration.baseFlair: The apprentice stepped forward, smiling confidently. The magus looked on, pretending he knew what was coming.
Madcap Conjuration.name: Madcap Conjuration
Madcap Conjuration.baseEffect: Discard your hand.If at least 2 spells were discarded, draw 5 cards.If at least 2 followers were discarded, destroy all followers.If at least 2 amulets were discarded, summon 2 Clay Golems and deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.

Ars Magna.baseFlair: Turn, Ouroboros! Show them your true power!
Ars Magna.name: Ars Magna
Ars Magna.baseEffect: Deal 3 damage to an enemy.Enhance (4): Restore 3 defense to your leader.

Prophecy of Boons.baseFlair: Even if only a little bit, my words will draw them in. —Runie, Destiny's Bard
Prophecy of Boons.name: Prophecy of Boons
Prophecy of Boons.baseEffect: Draw 2 cards.If this card has been Spellboosted at least 5 times, recover 2 play points.

Scourge of the Omniscient.baseFlair: Omniscience is the curse of knowing all, of being mired in arrogance. Pity the willful wretches, for tedium is their inevitable fate. The Fool takes you by the hand to the grey wasteland of the known.
Scourge of the Omniscient.name: Scourge of the Omniscient
Scourge of the Omniscient.baseEffect: Give the enemy leader the following effect: At the end of your turn, reduce your leader's maximum defense by 1. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match.)

Teachings of Creation.baseFlair: Throw away your books and rally in the woods. Nature is a treasure trove of knowledge.
Teachings of Creation.name: Teachings of Creation

Red-Hot Ritual.baseFlair: The flames are a threat to thoughtless beasts but a weapon for thoughtful wizards.
Red-Hot Ritual.name: Red-Hot Ritual
Red-Hot Ritual.baseEffect: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.

Enchanted Library.baseFlair: Quiet, please. Noise upsets the books. —A poster in the Enchanted Library
Enchanted Library.name: Enchanted Library
Enchanted Library.baseEffect: Countdown (2)At the end of your turn, put a random spell from your deck into your hand.

Silent Laboratory.baseFlair: I thought they were supposed to be making golems in there... But they seemed just as happy when they wound up with zombies. You don't think... they just wanted someone to talk to? That can't be it...—Neighbor of a certain lab
Silent Laboratory.name: Silent Laboratory
Silent Laboratory.baseEffect: Fanfare: Randomly summon 1 of the following - Clay Golem or Zombie.

Mirror of Truth.baseFlair: To a magician, a little excess flab is merely extra magic power.
Mirror of Truth.name: Mirror of Truth
Mirror of Truth.baseEffect: Fanfare: Select an enemy follower that costs 2 play points or less and summon an allied copy of it. If another allied Earth Sigil amulet is in play, put a Veridic Ritual into your hand.

Runic Guardian.baseFlair: Fear not, dear friends. On my father's runesword I do swear that no harm shall befall you!
Runic Guardian.evoFlair: Like my father before me, I shall serve as a defender! If you dare to face my family's rune, have at me!
Runic Guardian.name: Runic Guardian
Runic Guardian.baseEffect: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Gain +1/+1 and Ward.

Gauntleted Healer.baseFlair: Lie still. More than that ego of yours is bruised. Now pray my healing touch is enough to see you survive the night.
Gauntleted Healer.evoFlair: So our prayers were answered. My job here is done, for what it's worth. Rest a little, and Godspeed to you in the battles ahead.
Gauntleted Healer.name: Gauntleted Healer
Gauntleted Healer.baseEffect: Whenever you play a spell, restore 1 defense to your leader.
Gauntleted Healer.evoEffect: Whenever you play a spell, restore 1 defense to your leader.

Witchette Emmylou.baseFlair: You gotta try out this new spell I invented! It wasn't working the other day, but this time'll be the charm. I promise!
Witchette Emmylou.evoFlair: You gotta try out this new spell I invented! I just got it to work the other day, so you have nothing to worry about! Okay, let's do this!
Witchette Emmylou.name: Witchette Emmylou
Witchette Emmylou.baseEffect: Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.

Dazzling Healer.baseFlair: Yikes! Those boo-boos look bad! Really bad! I need to tend to them right now!
Dazzling Healer.evoFlair: A kiss'll make that boo-boo better! You'll soon feel as light as a flower petal!
Dazzling Healer.name: Dazzling Healer
Dazzling Healer.baseEffect: Fanfare: Restore 1 defense to all allied followers.Spellboost: Restore 1 more.

Mage of Nightfall.baseFlair: The darkness doesn't belong only to the night. It's mine as well.
Mage of Nightfall.evoFlair: The darkness doesn't belong only to the night. Long has it been my ally.
Mage of Nightfall.name: Mage of Nightfall
Mage of Nightfall.baseEffect: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Gain +1/+1 and Ambush.

Mysterian Summoner Vayle.baseFlair: We're always together, right Nic? As long as you're with me, we have nothing to fear!
Mysterian Summoner Vayle.evoFlair: As long as Nic is by my side, there's nothing we can't do. We're in this together, forever! Bring it on!
Mysterian Summoner Vayle.name: Mysterian Summoner Vayle
Mysterian Summoner Vayle.baseEffect: Whenever you play another Mysteria card, summon a Bunnicorn Nic-nic if there isn't an allied Bunnicorn Nic-nic in play.
Mysterian Summoner Vayle.evoEffect: Whenever you play another Mysteria card, summon a Bunnicorn Nic-nic if there isn't an allied Bunnicorn Nic-nic in play.

Tico, Mysterian Spellnerd.baseFlair: I'm so lucky I get to study at Mysteria Academy! Magic is miraculous! And the more I study, the more there is to learn! I'd be even happier if I had any actual talent for spell-casting...
Tico, Mysterian Spellnerd.evoFlair: I... I don't have any magical talent... so I can't cast any really strong spells. But... I still believe in myself. I have to believe there's something special about me!
Tico, Mysterian Spellnerd.name: Tico, Mysterian Spellnerd
Tico, Mysterian Spellnerd.baseEffect: Last Words: Put a Mysterian Circle into your hand.
Tico, Mysterian Spellnerd.evoEffect: Last Words: Put a Mysterian Rite into your hand.

Passionate Potioneer.baseFlair: My equipment is a mess, my lab is wrecked, and my eyes are watering! This is incredible! A completely unexpected reaction! This experiment is a smashing success!
Passionate Potioneer.evoFlair: There's no such thing as a failed experiment—just successes... and bigger successes! If you get the result you were after, that's a success! If you don't, then you just made a brand-new discovery! That's a huge success!
Passionate Potioneer.name: Passionate Potioneer
Passionate Potioneer.baseEffect: Fanfare: Select an allied amulet and put a copy of that amulet into your hand. Subtract 1 from its cost.

Arcane Auteur.baseFlair: All right, that's this month's manuscripts. No need to thank me. When you become as experienced a writer as me, you always leave some wiggle room at the end. Huh? What do you mean I missed the deadline?
Arcane Auteur.evoFlair: That feeling when you think the deadline's ages away, only to find it's long passed? Yes, I know that feeling all too well...—Ghostwriter
Arcane Auteur.name: Arcane Auteur
Arcane Auteur.baseEffect: Last Words: Put an Insight into your hand.

Ice Golem.baseFlair: The golem's life is fleeting, like a glimpse of a dream. But its body is more unyielding than any steel or midnight reverie.
Ice Golem.evoFlair: The golem's life is but a passing dream. It briefly defends its master and then melts into nothing.
Ice Golem.name: Ice Golem
Ice Golem.baseEffect: Ward. Can't attack.At the end of your opponent's turn, destroy this follower.
Ice Golem.evoEffect: Ward. Can't attack.At the end of your opponent's turn, this follower is destroyed.

Demonic Shikigami.baseFlair: Five, six, seven, eight. Voices join together and resound. The words are powerful enough to control demons. Truly frightening.—A Guide to Onmyodo: Interlude
Demonic Shikigami.evoFlair: Onmyodo, a momentous curse. Terrifying, without a doubt.A fearsome shikigami, like a demon. Its strength is limitless.—A Guide to Onmyodo: Interlude
Demonic Shikigami.name: Demonic Shikigami
Demonic Shikigami.baseEffect: Last Words: Spellboost the cards in your hand.

Spectral Wizard.baseFlair: A game without stakes is no game at all. How does the wagering of our souls sound?
Spectral Wizard.evoFlair: Now, now. No one likes a sore loser, especially down in the hellhole where you'll be going.
Spectral Wizard.name: Spectral Wizard
Spectral Wizard.evoEffect: Evolve: Spellboost the cards in your hand 2 times.

Clarke, Arcane Scholar.baseFlair: I've no interest in musty ink scrawled on yellowed parchment. I desire new knowledge, wonders known to no man!
Clarke, Arcane Scholar.evoFlair: To find new knowledge, it's necessary to leave all the dusty books behind and head out into the world. I'm not about to sit around waiting for wisdom, like some baby bird with its mouth agape.
Clarke, Arcane Scholar.name: Clarke, Arcane Scholar
Clarke, Arcane Scholar.baseEffect: Fanfare: Spellboost the followers in your hand 2 times.

Mysterian Grimoire.baseFlair: Grimoires are like students: some are quiet while others are more troublesome. —Mr. Heinlein
Mysterian Grimoire.evoFlair: The more powerful the grimoire, the more troublesome and dangerous it can be. You can't be too careful. —Mr. Heinlein
Mysterian Grimoire.name: Mysterian Grimoire
Mysterian Grimoire.baseEffect: Fanfare: Draw 2 cards. Give your leader the following effect: At the end of this turn, discard all spells in your hand.

Magic Gun Hunter.baseFlair: Sure, the going's easier with others, but work alone and you rake in the cash! That's why there's no one I trust but this little dude, my magic gun!
Magic Gun Hunter.evoFlair: You gotta have a magic gun! It almost never leaves a mark on your game. Trophies without cuts or punctures fetch a higher price after all!
Magic Gun Hunter.name: Magic Gun Hunter
Magic Gun Hunter.baseEffect: Fanfare: If there are no other allied followers in play, gain Rush and Last Words: Put a Magic Gun Hunter into your hand until the end of the turn.

Karl, Pious Instructor.baseFlair: Compared to that uncivilized shadow magic, my holy magic is perfectly safe. Not only can it heal the body, but it can also soothe the heart.
Karl, Pious Instructor.evoFlair: The effects of holy magic change depending on the state of the heart. If a wicked person wields it, then the effects could become equally nasty. Everyone, be careful during your own studies.
Karl, Pious Instructor.name: Karl, Pious Instructor
Karl, Pious Instructor.baseEffect: Fanfare: Summon an Earth Essence.Whenever an allied Earth Sigil amulet comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.
Karl, Pious Instructor.evoEffect: Whenever an allied Earth Sigil amulet comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.

Elusa, Magic Wunderkind.baseFlair: It goes without saying, but you're extremely lucky to see the magic of a wunderkind like me. I mean, I'm Elusa after all!
Elusa, Magic Wunderkind.evoFlair: It's almost snack time, so I guess I can give, like, ten percent of what I've got. Now check out the amazing magic of the one-and-only Elusa!
Elusa, Magic Wunderkind.name: Elusa, Magic Wunderkind
Elusa, Magic Wunderkind.evoEffect: Evolve: Summon an Imperial Mammoth and give it Rush. Banish it at the start of your next turn. Perform Earth Rite: Give it Ward.

Clarisse, Unpolished Mage.baseFlair: I'm the adorable alchemical prodigy, Clarisse! Yay! Just leave those icky monsters to me! I'll gather 'em all together and then kapow! Make sure you don't get caught by the blast, okay? Hehe.
Clarisse, Unpolished Mage.evoFlair: Dissolution is the solution! I'm the best when it comes to blowing stuff up—even better than Master Cags! Wanna see? Great! Everyone, get ready for the biggest kapow of your lives!
Clarisse, Unpolished Mage.name: Clarisse, Unpolished Mage
Clarisse, Unpolished Mage.baseEffect: Fanfare: Remove all effects on an enemy follower except changes to its attack or defense.

Disciple of Truth.baseFlair: Our way is truth. Yours is deception. Discard your name, your rank, and your intentions. Else I shall destroy them. Then the truth will be displayed before you.
Disciple of Truth.evoFlair: The Second Rite: Discard DeceptionDeceit—that is to say, everything which is not truth—must be abandoned. Release thy true nature. —Teachings of the Assembly of Truth
Disciple of Truth.name: Disciple of Truth
Disciple of Truth.baseEffect: Accelerate (1): Restore 1 defense to your leader.----------Fanfare: Restore 1 defense to your leader.

Emmylou, Smilemancer.baseFlair: Yeah! Uh-huh! That's the spirit! I've been saving this happy little spell just for you! No way I'll mess this one up—just a little hocus, pocus, pow!
Emmylou, Smilemancer.evoFlair: "A spell for smiles? Can you teach me how to do it too?!"—Lou, Mysterian Freshman"Easy, all you gotta do is swish, sparkle, and alakazam!"—Emmylou, Smilemancer
Emmylou, Smilemancer.name: Emmylou, Smilemancer
Emmylou, Smilemancer.baseEffect: Fanfare: Summon an Earth Essence.Whenever an allied Earth Sigil amulet comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Emmylou, Smilemancer.evoEffect: Whenever an allied Earth Sigil amulet comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.

Pyromancer.baseFlair: O fire which brings both growth and termination. Master of furious ascension. Cardinal direction: South. Domain of the Salamandra. You who heat and dry. Your flames are like the finest music. Both reduce their audiences to ash.
Pyromancer.evoFlair: O fire which brings both growth and termination. Master of furious ascension. Cardinal direction: South. Domain of the Salamandra. You who heat and dry. Your flames are much like dreams. Both inspire a longing that burns from the inside out.
Pyromancer.name: Pyromancer
Pyromancer.baseEffect: Fanfare: If any allied amulets are in play, return 1 to your hand and deal 1 damage to all followers. If the returned card is a Naterran Great Tree, deal 2 damage instead.

Europa.baseFlair: Due to her godhood, she is immortal. She has never born a scar from the passage of time. But even so, she is a frail, tender, and eternal flower from heaven with beauty beyond compare.
Europa.evoFlair: Some flowers mustn't be plucked. Some flowers can't help but be plucked. One god sought out her beauty. After accepting the god's favor, she reached full bloom.
Europa.name: Europa

Grea, Mysterian Dragoness.baseFlair: I used to hate my powers. I thought they were only good for hurting others... that I'd be better off without them. But I was wrong. They give me the strength to protect everything I love!
Grea, Mysterian Dragoness.evoFlair: Not even the terror of battle can compare to the prospect of losing those dear to you. I'm done hesitating. I'll do whatever it takes to protect my friends!
Grea, Mysterian Dragoness.name: Grea, Mysterian Dragoness
Grea, Mysterian Dragoness.evoEffect: Ward.Evolve: Choose - Put a Grea's Ember or Grea's Inferno into your hand.

Eleanor, Cosmic Flower.baseFlair: Flowers are not constrained to grow in the soil; they may bloom beyond the heavens. I am one such blossom. Gaze up at me with fear and respect in your heart, for I am Eleanor Gloria, the Cosmic Flower!
Eleanor, Cosmic Flower.evoFlair: My very existence flies counter to the laws of this world. I bloom with my roots neither in the soil nor in the sky. My domain lies beyond the world's rules and beyond the blue. I shall bloom unfettered, unfailing, unparalleled!
Eleanor, Cosmic Flower.name: Eleanor, Cosmic Flower
Eleanor, Cosmic Flower.baseEffect: Fanfare: If there is a card in your hand that has been Spellboosted fewer than 3 times, Spellboost that card until it has been Spellboosted a total of 3 times.
Eleanor, Cosmic Flower.evoEffect: Evolve: Put a Splendid Conjury into your hand.

Magitech Golem.baseFlair: Thanks to its tremendous power, the controversy surrounding the use of machines was resolved. A small amount of mana makes the golem move, while its strength is amplified by machines, making it the premier magical life form. —Mage Association Research Report, Part 3
Magitech Golem.evoFlair: The use of machines to amplify magic power far surpassed our expectations. There is no one left who would argue against the application of such technology. But we must continue our research, for new battles await us.
Magitech Golem.name: Magitech Golem
Magitech Golem.baseEffect: Whenever you play another Machina card, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
Magitech Golem.evoEffect: Evolve: Put a Repair Mode into your hand.Whenever you play another Machina card, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.

Kyoka, Prize Pupil.baseFlair: Who are you? You've been staring at me for a while now. That must make you... a creep.
Kyoka, Prize Pupil.evoFlair: Oh, you just want to play? You should've said that in the first place! Sheesh, what a weirdo. Okay, fine. I guess I can kill some time with you.
Kyoka, Prize Pupil.name: Kyoka, Prize Pupil
Kyoka, Prize Pupil.baseEffect: Fanfare: Spellboost the cards in your hand.Union Burst (10): Deal 7 damage to an enemy follower. Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
Kyoka, Prize Pupil.evoEffect: Evolve: Spellboost the cards in your hand. Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.

Stormelementalist.baseFlair: O volatile and fickle wind. Master of endurance and change. Combined with water, it becomes the raging gale. Aye, look at her blowin' around up there, with my feet down here on the ground—quite the competition, ain't she? —Aeroelementalist
Stormelementalist.evoFlair: The elementalists chose their path. They would cut ties from the foul machinists and act as wardens for all creation. Humanity's purpose, after all, was to live alongside nature—not to control it. —Magica Principia, Part 3
Stormelementalist.name: Stormelementalist
Stormelementalist.baseEffect: Fanfare: If any allied amulets are in play, return 1 to your hand and restore 2 defense to your leader.
Stormelementalist.evoEffect: Evolve: Return an allied amulet to your hand and deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. (Activates only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)

Formbender.baseFlair: How do you do! What a terrible pleasure it is to meet you! Oh, whoops, that wasn't very polite of me, was it?
Formbender.evoFlair: I grow weary of your presence! Oh, whoops, I seem to have misplaced my manners.
Formbender.name: Formbender
Formbender.baseEffect: Fanfare: Transform another follower or amulet into a Clay Golem. If this card has been Spellboosted at least 5 times and the selected card was an allied card, transform it into an Eldritch Chimera instead.

Abomination Awakened.baseFlair: Fear is the first step of worship, and hatred follows love. My dear mage, I am the nightmare you awakened. Know that even if you seal me away, freedom shall be mine in the end.
Abomination Awakened.evoFlair: These fetters are already part of me. You, my dear mage, shall soon be freed from the fetters of life!
Abomination Awakened.name: Abomination Awakened
Abomination Awakened.baseEffect: Can't attack.If the number of cards in your hand increases to 9 during your turn, evolve this follower and deal 3 damage to all enemy followers.

Slumbering Calamity.baseFlair: The alchemical manipulation of life is heresy. Have you experienced the ultimate heresy, the most blasphemous and reviled of all magic? Then allow me to demonstrate.—Heretic Alchemist
Slumbering Calamity.evoFlair: Bind life into lumps of earth. Forcibly assembled, that life will suffer, warp, rail, and finally burst forth into violence. Pure, clean life can't hold a candle to it.—Heretic Alchemist
Slumbering Calamity.name: Slumbering Calamity
Slumbering Calamity.baseEffect: Ward. Fanfare: Earth Rite - Gain +2/+0.Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Deal X damage to all enemies. X equals this follower's attack.

Magisa, Ruinfist Witch.baseFlair: When her fist touches the earth, she grasps a single lump of dirt; with a delicate technique she diffuses mana, imbuing the clod with life. When her fist touches a soldier, she grasps a single lump of flesh; a reckless technique bestows mana, imbuing the man with strength.
Magisa, Ruinfist Witch.evoFlair: "She treats a battle like a performance," a veteran soldier grumbled. "But she's the only one enjoying the show."
Magisa, Ruinfist Witch.name: Magisa, Ruinfist Witch
Magisa, Ruinfist Witch.baseEffect: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Summon a Clay Golem.Fanfare: Earth Rite (2) - Then deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.Fanfare: Earth Rite (3) - Then gain Storm.Fanfare: Earth Rite (4) - Then gain +3/+3.

Wish Wielder.baseFlair: The djinn said it could grant the man only a limited number of wishes. So the man wished for unlimited wishes. Since then their lives have been inextricably linked, and quite the strange duo they make.—Ten Thousand and One Nights, Night 731
Wish Wielder.evoFlair: The man wished to bring peace to a troubled world. The djinn had never before encountered a human with wishes so selfless. Without realizing, they had begun to act as one. Their names spoken throughout the three realms.—Ten Thousand and One Nights, Night 774
Wish Wielder.name: Wish Wielder
Wish Wielder.baseEffect: Fanfare: If this card has been Spellboosted 5 times or less, randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand.If this card has been Spellboosted 6 to 11 times, randomly put 2 into your hand instead.If this card has been Spellboosted at least 12 times, randomly put 3 into your hand instead.-Cassiopeia-Jiraiya-Adramelech-Demonlord Eachtar-Spawn of the Abyss-Dark Jeanne-Sylvia, the Condemner

Summon Snow.baseFlair: In nature we simply watch the seasons pass. In magic we create them.
Summon Snow.name: Summon Snow

Witchbolt.name: Witchbolt
Witchbolt.baseEffect: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.Draw a card if an evolved allied follower is in play.

Rite of Exorcism.baseFlair: This is an exceptional rite indeed. —Master Mage
Rite of Exorcism.name: Rite of Exorcism
Rite of Exorcism.baseEffect: Destroy an enemy follower that costs 3 play points or less.Enhance (5): Destroy an enemy follower or amulet instead.

Astral Divination.baseFlair: The constellations etched into the night sky may be mere scatterings of light to those without the knowledge to decipher them. But those learned in their patterns can read freely of their own futures. —Chapter 1, The Basics of Fortune-Telling
Astral Divination.name: Astral Divination
Astral Divination.baseEffect: Randomly put 2 of the following cards into your hand.-Venus-Pollux-Star Phoenix-Castor-Scorpius-AndromedaEarth Rite: Subtract 1 from the cost of those cards.

Mystic Absorption.baseFlair: I could list all of the hundreds of flaws in your spellcasting, but perhaps your greatest mistake was making your magic... banal.—Nameless Mage
Mystic Absorption.name: Mystic Absorption
Mystic Absorption.baseEffect: Banish an enemy follower with 2 defense or less. If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, banish any enemy follower instead.Draw a card.

Sorcery Cache.baseFlair: Quiet whispers unite to form a great chorus.
Sorcery Cache.name: Sorcery Cache
Sorcery Cache.baseEffect: Spellboost a card in your hand 2 times.Draw a card.

Petrification.baseFlair: Whether you turn to mud or vanish from this world completely, you mean nothing.
Petrification.name: Petrification
Petrification.baseEffect: Transform an enemy follower or amulet into a Clay Golem.Earth Rite: Banish it instead.

Summon Iceform.baseFlair: This soulless creature of ice has just enough life within it to last one night.
Summon Iceform.name: Summon Iceform

Concentration.baseFlair: If mankind has its eyes on the past and its back to the future, then magekind has its back to the past and its eyes on the future. —Teachings of the Leonardian Magic Society
Concentration.name: Concentration
Concentration.baseEffect: Draw 2 cards.Earth Rite: Draw 3 cards instead. Then restore 1 defense to your leader.

Sleep Incantation.baseFlair: "You're tired, aren't you? Why don't you go ahead and sleep?" said the sorceress, grinning like a demon."There, there... Rock-a-bye baby, on the battlefield..."
Sleep Incantation.name: Sleep Incantation
Sleep Incantation.baseEffect: Draw a card.Select a follower. It can't attack until the start of your next turn.Return that follower to the player's hand instead if you have 20 cards or less in your deck.

Veridic Discovery.baseFlair: Ah, truth... We meet again. —Young Alchemist
Veridic Discovery.name: Veridic Discovery
Veridic Discovery.baseEffect: Summon a Clay Golem. Give +1/+0 to all allied Clay Golems.Earth Rite: Put a Veridic Ritual into your hand.

First Curse.baseFlair: This primeval curse ends in inevitable death.
First Curse.name: First Curse
First Curse.baseEffect: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. Put a Second Curse into your hand.

Secrets of Erasmus.baseFlair: That was just a little yawn. —Erasmus
Secrets of Erasmus.name: Secrets of Erasmus
Secrets of Erasmus.baseEffect: Deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower.Enhance (9): Summon an Arch Summoner Erasmus instead.

Absolute Zeroblade.baseFlair: It's been ages since I had such a heated battle. Consider this my way of saying thanks. —An ice mage
Absolute Zeroblade.name: Absolute Zeroblade
Absolute Zeroblade.baseEffect: Destroy an enemy follower with 2 defense or less.Draw a card if an evolved allied follower is in play.Spellboost: Destroy a follower with 1 more defense.

Grea's Inferno.baseFlair: "If you dare lay a finger on those that I love, then you're my enemy. And I burn my enemies to the ground!" —Grea, Mysterian Dragoness
Grea's Inferno.name: Grea's Inferno
Grea's Inferno.baseEffect: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this 5 times.

Golem Squad.baseFlair: Reproduce, multiply, permeate every corner of the land! Surely even the gods would envy us. If you truly wish for this land to flourish, let us build.—A Confident Sorcerer
Golem Squad.name: Golem Squad
Golem Squad.baseEffect: If this card has been Spellboosted 5 times or less, summon a Clay Golem and a Scrap Golem. If this card has been Spellboosted 6 to 11 times, summon a Guardian Golem and a Clay Golem.If this card has been Spellboosted at least 12 times, summon an Ultimate Clay Golem and a Guardian Golem.

Elementary Alchemy.baseFlair: All great alchemists' work began from that single book.
Elementary Alchemy.name: Elementary Alchemy

Price of Magic.baseFlair: For this noble sacrifice, you have my gratitude.
Price of Magic.name: Price of Magic
Price of Magic.baseEffect: Fanfare: Banish an enemy follower with 2 defense or less.

Gingerbread House.baseFlair: I'll give you lots of sweets, so give me your sweet life. —Witch of the Woods
Gingerbread House.name: Gingerbread House
Gingerbread House.baseEffect: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. Restore 2 defense to your leader.

Sagacious Core.baseFlair: An orb of concentrated wisdom. Those who seek enlightenment find themselves drawn to its luster.
Sagacious Core.name: Sagacious Core
Sagacious Core.baseEffect: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, put 2 Insights into your hand, recover 2 play points, and then banish this amulet.

Crest Wizard.baseFlair: If I could only get this barrier up, no man or men could harm me. Please, everyone, give me just a moment!
Crest Wizard.evoFlair: At long last I am ready! Let the counterattack begin! Steel your hearts, hold your heads high—and move out!
Crest Wizard.name: Crest Wizard
Crest Wizard.baseEffect: Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Crest Wizard.evoEffect: Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.

Veteran Alchemist.baseFlair: You look all bent out of shape. Here, I have just the remedy for that.
Veteran Alchemist.evoFlair: Please, it should be me thanking you. I've been wanting to test that out on someone for some time.
Veteran Alchemist.name: Veteran Alchemist
Veteran Alchemist.baseEffect: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Restore 5 defense to your leader.

Crystal Bombarder.baseFlair: The crystals lend their strength only to those bold enough to face the unknown.
Crystal Bombarder.evoFlair: The crystals glitter for those on a relentless quest for knowledge.
Crystal Bombarder.name: Crystal Bombarder
Crystal Bombarder.baseEffect: Whenever another follower evolves, Spellboost the cards in your hand.
Crystal Bombarder.evoEffect: Whenever another follower evolves, Spellboost the cards in your hand.

Timeless Witch.baseFlair: Eternity must be quite a bore. When I met the witch, she yawned so much tears streamed from her eyes. —A certain villager
Timeless Witch.evoFlair: When she asked me if I want to live forever, I politely declined. No point in enduring an eternity of yawns. —A certain villager
Timeless Witch.name: Timeless Witch
Timeless Witch.baseEffect: Fanfare: Reduce damage to your leader to 0 until this follower leaves play.

Halo Golem.baseFlair: By using energy clean and pure, the white mage created a blessed golem that towered over her foes. Driven by the mage's heartfelt wishes, the golem crushed those foes, leaving lifeless hunks of meat in its wake.
Halo Golem.evoFlair: Regardless of whether the golem is driven by powers of good or evil, what is required of it remains the same: to smash and destroy as commanded.
Halo Golem.name: Halo Golem
Halo Golem.baseEffect: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Deal 3 damage to an enemy.

Apprentice Swordmage.baseFlair: My master's hidden arts! And this, my enchanted blade!
Apprentice Swordmage.evoFlair: Your ilk could never comprehend the depth of my master's power!
Apprentice Swordmage.name: Apprentice Swordmage
Apprentice Swordmage.baseEffect: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 if the number of Neutral cards in your hand equals or exceeds the number of Runecraft cards in your hand (excluding this card).

Lightning Lancer.baseFlair: The violet lightning strikes simply because it can do nothing else. She sharpens her magic and waits for that instant.
Lightning Lancer.evoFlair: Her form, a bolt falling from the heavens. Her spearhead, flashing with violent violet lightning, pierces all.
Lightning Lancer.name: Lightning Lancer
Lightning Lancer.evoEffect: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.

Moonshade Mage.baseFlair: Glimmering moon! Resplendent darkness! Grant me power! I cannot be defeated so long as the moon is out! Never!
Moonshade Mage.evoFlair: The moonlight's magic is infinite! And I'm invincible while its power is mine. There's no way that you can win! Never!
Moonshade Mage.name: Moonshade Mage

Mechastaff Sorcerer.baseFlair: The source of the core's metamorphosis was the development of a magical item. With the help of a mechanical staff, a retired elderly mage was able to recover the power he held in his heyday. —Mage Association Research Report, Part 1
Mechastaff Sorcerer.evoFlair: That mechanical staff is something else! The old man was beside himself. Even if you don't have enough mana, the machine's own power fills in the blanks. I wager that thing could be used to move something pretty enormous. —Comment about Magical Technology 1
Mechastaff Sorcerer.name: Mechastaff Sorcerer
Mechastaff Sorcerer.baseEffect: Fanfare: If you have at least 2 other Machina cards in your hand, deal 3 damage to an enemy.

Piquant Potioneer.baseFlair: My best-selling potions? Let's see... The emerald green potion augments spells. It tastes like fire. The electric purple potion induces paralysis. It tastes like fire.
Piquant Potioneer.evoFlair: You'd like to see my latest concoctions? Well, this ultramarine potion induces silence. It tastes like fire. The amber potion increases strength. It tastes like fire.
Piquant Potioneer.name: Piquant Potioneer
Piquant Potioneer.baseEffect: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers. If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, deal 3 damage instead.

Guardian Golem.baseFlair: The iron giant creaks into life whenever there is a threat to its master. Its single eye is a window into its pure heart.
Guardian Golem.evoFlair: The guardian golem feels no hatred and no joy. It simply identifies and eliminates threats to its master. There is perhaps nothing more frightening than such well-meaning violence.
Guardian Golem.name: Guardian Golem

Demonflame Mage.baseFlair: The god of destruction quickens, scorching foul creatures one and all.
Demonflame Mage.evoFlair: As the flames surged forth, no abomination was spared.
Demonflame Mage.name: Demonflame Mage
Demonflame Mage.evoEffect: Evolve: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.

Queen Medb.baseFlair: Cuhullin! A curse upon you and your ilk! Pray your death alone is enough to right the wrongs enacted against me.
Queen Medb.evoFlair: This curse will never let you go, my dear boy. The day you break the curse is the day you die.
Queen Medb.name: Queen Medb
Queen Medb.baseEffect: When this follower comes into play, give your leader the following effect: Followers can't be played. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.)
Queen Medb.evoEffect: When this follower comes into play, give your leader the following effect: Followers can't be played. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.)

Rune Blade Summoner.baseFlair: Sounds like they're calling my name. Not a moment too soon either. My blades are ravenous for the taste of blood.
Rune Blade Summoner.evoFlair: Wielding blades with magic is an abomination? What does it matter once they're buried in the heart of your enemy?
Rune Blade Summoner.name: Rune Blade Summoner

Remi & Rami, Witchy Duo.baseFlair: There's another girl who lives within me. She scares me. Please don't do anything to wake her.
Remi & Rami, Witchy Duo.evoFlair: I'd never let the gods lay a hand on Remi or me. Now, my toys, dance to my melody. Dance!
Remi & Rami, Witchy Duo.name: Remi & Rami, Witchy Duo
Remi & Rami, Witchy Duo.evoEffect: Evolve: Earth Rite - Summon a Guardian Golem.

Lorea, Dancer of the Sun.baseFlair: Eh, maybe I'm not as good as Pascale—but I'll save you with my dance!
Lorea, Dancer of the Sun.evoFlair: Doesn't matter the foe, we'll beat him! What would Pascale say? Probably something like, "I'll knock you out!"
Lorea, Dancer of the Sun.name: Lorea, Dancer of the Sun
Lorea, Dancer of the Sun.baseEffect: Fanfare: Summon an Earth Essence if there are no allied Earth Sigil amulets in play.Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Double all other allied followers' attack and defense.

Joycrafter Sammy.baseFlair: Come one, come all! The amazing Sammy has returned with a brand new bag of tricks! Get ready for a night of marvels!
Joycrafter Sammy.evoFlair: With magic, anything is possible, and that's the truth! Are you ready? One, two, three... Abracadabra!
Joycrafter Sammy.name: Joycrafter Sammy
Joycrafter Sammy.baseEffect: Fanfare: Both players draw a card.
Joycrafter Sammy.evoEffect: Evolve: Both players draw a card.

Palla, Student Teacher.baseFlair: My name is Palla. I'm a student teacher, in charge of the light arts. I'm... pleased to meet you. What? I look angry? No, I... I'm sorry. That's just my usual expression...
Palla, Student Teacher.evoFlair: I'm still pretty green... and people tell me I seem standoffish. But I want to help you all realize your full potential. So, um... N-now... watch closely! Ah... that's not it. How does Miss Miranda do that?
Palla, Student Teacher.name: Palla, Student Teacher
Palla, Student Teacher.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put a Burgeoning Genius into your hand.
Palla, Student Teacher.evoEffect: Evolve: Subtract 1 from the cost of a Mysteria card in your hand.

Cagliostro, Adorable Genius.baseFlair: I'm so tired... Hey, Captain, will you give me a piggyback ride? Come on! You know you want to. Tee-hee.
Cagliostro, Adorable Genius.evoFlair: Hehe. Time for a one-on-one lesson from the founder of alchemy herself, so listen up. The deepest truth known to man iiiis this—the most adorable thing in the entire world is me, Cagliostro! The super cute genius alchemist!
Cagliostro, Adorable Genius.name: Cagliostro, Adorable Genius
Cagliostro, Adorable Genius.baseEffect: Fanfare: Summon an Earth Essence.Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Recover 1 evolution point.
Cagliostro, Adorable Genius.evoEffect: Evolve: Earth Rite - Put an Ars Magna into your hand, and recover 2 play points.

Lovely-Heart Monika.baseFlair: Lovely Brave Cure! Infinite Magic! You can call me Magical Girl Lovely-Heart Monika, the skies' most magical admiral! In the name of the skies, I'll lead you!Phew! Being a magical girl is rough!
Lovely-Heart Monika.evoFlair: Looks and status mean nothing when it comes to helping people! Whether I'm a Valerian admiral or a magical girl, I'll always do my duty! Now follow me! We'll stop evil in its tracks!
Lovely-Heart Monika.name: Lovely-Heart Monika
Lovely-Heart Monika.baseEffect: Fanfare: Summon a Morra, Monika's Familiar.
Lovely-Heart Monika.evoEffect: Evolve: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of allied followers in play.

Levi, Accomplished Mage.baseFlair: "Surely you've heard of my name?"​When asked by a great wizard, it's unwise to answer no.​"No? Very well, allow me to introduce myself!"​Rather than a traditional introduction, you'll most likelyreceive a blast of magic to the face.
Levi, Accomplished Mage.evoFlair: "Surely you've heard of my name?"​When asked by a great wizard, it's unwise to answer yes.​"Excellent! Then surely you'd be willing to help one of mystature with very important magical research, yes?"You'll most likely never hear the end of it.
Levi, Accomplished Mage.name: Levi, Accomplished Mage
Levi, Accomplished Mage.baseEffect: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals 2 times the number of allied amulets in play.
Levi, Accomplished Mage.evoEffect: Evolve: Earth Rite - Put a random Earth Sigil amulet and a random card with Earth Rite from your deck into your hand.

Imperator of Magic.baseFlair: Kneel before The Emperor, the ultimate authority. His vassals are golems; his loyal subjects, factotums. With dignity, he reigns over them all. With but the crook of a finger, he has founded an empire—one built on magic's might.
Imperator of Magic.evoFlair: He is a dominant force, ruling through the might of magic. Artifacts and incantations fall under his purview. He wields them with grace, setting his empire to rights. All magic resides within him, granting him supremacy.
Imperator of Magic.name: Imperator of Magic
Imperator of Magic.baseEffect: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Summon an Emergency Summoning.Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Recover 1 evolution point.
Imperator of Magic.evoEffect: Evolve: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of allied Earth Sigil amulets destroyed this match.

Merlin.baseFlair: A cursed magician with the blood of both men and demons running through her veins. Her advice guided the wise King Arthur, son of Uther Pendragon, through many troubles.
Merlin.evoFlair: Merlin offered much advice at Arthur's round table. She saw the king, his knights, and Camelot through all sorts of hardships. In the end an unforeseen storm would expedite her date with destiny.
Merlin.name: Merlin
Merlin.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put a random spell with Spellboost from your deck into your hand.Strike: Spellboost the cards in your hand.
Merlin.evoEffect: Evolve: Put a random spell with Spellboost from your deck into your hand.Strike: Spellboost the cards in your hand.

Runie, Destiny's Bard.baseFlair: The weather tomorrow, catching fish... those are about the only things on my mind right now. But you need me, don't you? Then I'll do it: I'll divine the fate of the world.
Runie, Destiny's Bard.evoFlair: The only thing I can do is to see. To listen to the voice of the world. So you're the one who decides. I leave the fate of the world in your hands.
Runie, Destiny's Bard.name: Runie, Destiny's Bard
Runie, Destiny's Bard.baseEffect: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Prophecy of Boons or Prophecy of Doom into your hand.Strike: Spellboost the cards in your hand.
Runie, Destiny's Bard.evoEffect: Strike: Spellboost the cards in your hand.

Vesper, Witchhunter.baseFlair: The craft of witchery is rooted in practice and ritual, held dear to its followers. Rejecting tradition, she was branded a heretic. However, all who dared to challenge would perish before her—the unrivaled witch hunter.
Vesper, Witchhunter.evoFlair: What purpose does tradition serve if it cannot defeat a heretic? Witchcraft's essence lies not within the process, but results. Skin besmirched with crimson—the mark of a formidable witch.
Vesper, Witchhunter.name: Vesper, Witchhunter
Vesper, Witchhunter.baseEffect: Accelerate (2): Deal 1 damage to an enemy. Summon a Witch's Cauldron.---------- Fanfare: Earth Rite - Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Vesper, Witchhunter.evoEffect: Evolve: If another allied follower is in play, destroy that follower and gain +2/+2.

Tetra, Sapphire Rebel.baseFlair: I may be made of metal, but I can think for myself. If he wants to take that free will from me, if he insists on crushing those like me... Then I have no choice but to rebel against him and his world.
