Tetra, Sapphire Rebel.evoFlair: If I had no emotions, then I would not feel sadness. There would be no need to grieve fallen friends. But I do not have that luxury. I have to oppose him for the sake of our very future.
Tetra, Sapphire Rebel.name: Tetra, Sapphire Rebel
Tetra, Sapphire Rebel.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put a Repair Mode into your hand.Strike: Recover 1 play point.
Tetra, Sapphire Rebel.evoEffect: Evolve: Put a Delta Cannon into your hand.Strike: Recover 1 play point.

Celestial Shikigami.baseFlair: Nine, ten. The one true shikigami. All others are merely pieces of rubbish scraped together.—A Guide to Onmyodo: Conclusion
Celestial Shikigami.evoFlair: Your minions are no more than playthings. This is what a real shikigami looks like. But have fun collecting those worthless scraps of paper.—Kuon, Founder of Onmyodo
Celestial Shikigami.name: Celestial Shikigami
Celestial Shikigami.baseEffect: Ward.Last Words: Spellboost the cards in your hand 3 times.

Conjure Twosome.baseFlair: One with my left hand, one with my right. Creating life is so simple.
Conjure Twosome.name: Conjure Twosome

Fissure Bomb.baseFlair: One burst of earth, and everything is blown away.
Fissure Bomb.name: Fissure Bomb
Fissure Bomb.baseEffect: Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower.Earth Rite: Put a Conjure Guardian into your hand.

Piercing Rune.baseFlair: A real mage can fell both the rider and the horse at the same time.
Piercing Rune.name: Piercing Rune
Piercing Rune.baseEffect: Whenever an allied follower evolves, change the cost of this card to 2.----------Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower and then 2 damage to the enemy leader.

Burgeoning Genius.baseFlair: "If I can just awaken my latent powers, the test'll be a piece of cake!" "But what if you don't make it in time for the test?" "I guess it's remedial classes for me, then!" —Lou and Hanna
Burgeoning Genius.name: Burgeoning Genius
Burgeoning Genius.baseEffect: Recover 1 evolution point.Summon a Guardian Golem if you have 20 cards or less in your deck.

Fire Chain.baseFlair: Ah, those fires? They keep on going in a chain. Once, twice, and sometimes even forever.
Fire Chain.name: Fire Chain
Fire Chain.baseEffect: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this 1 time.Spellboost: Repeat 1 time.

Nova Flare.baseFlair: One thousand words, she possessed. One meaning, they shared.
Nova Flare.name: Nova Flare

Rite of the Ignorant.baseFlair: The privilege of ignorance is the acquisition of knowledge; the naive shall inherit the earth. Take heed of the challenge The Fool lays at your feet, for there is no treasure more precious than what lies in the unknown.
Rite of the Ignorant.name: Rite of the Ignorant
Rite of the Ignorant.baseEffect: Give your leader the following effect: At the start of your turn, draw a card and Spellboost it X times. X equals a random number between 1 and 10. Then give it the following effect: At the end of your turn, discard this card. (This leader effect lasts for the rest of the match.)

Alchemist's Workshop.baseFlair: Don't worry! Me and my alchemy will distend you! Uh, defend. Defend you!
Alchemist's Workshop.name: Alchemist's Workshop

Summoning Drills.baseFlair: We've worked so hard at our drills. I know we're gonna summon something seriously freaky! —A fledgling mage
Summoning Drills.name: Summoning Drills
Summoning Drills.baseEffect: Countdown (3)Fanfare: Summon a Guardian Golem.Last Words: Summon a Scrap Golem.

Whirlwind Mage.baseFlair: Ever seen a twister tear across the land, devouring everything in sight before spitting it out? Wanna ride one?
Whirlwind Mage.evoFlair: I know! I'll gift you an experience of aerial ecstasy before bringing you back down to earth headfirst! Splat!
Whirlwind Mage.name: Whirlwind Mage
Whirlwind Mage.baseEffect: Whenever you play a spell, gain +1/+1.
Whirlwind Mage.evoEffect: Whenever you play a spell, gain +1/+1.

Grand Gargoyle.baseFlair: An almost palpable magic infuses the winged gargoyle enshrined at the temple.
Grand Gargoyle.evoFlair: A vigilant winged gargoyle watches over the church. Its hidden magic is unleashed at the first sign of intruders.
Grand Gargoyle.name: Grand Gargoyle
Grand Gargoyle.baseEffect: Last Words: Summon an Earth Essence.
Grand Gargoyle.evoEffect: Last Words: Summon an Earth Essence.

Ogler.baseFlair: I just wanted to summon something cool. But look at the ugly beastie I ended up with! —A student of Mysteria Academy
Ogler.evoFlair: I couldn't get away from the creature, but it grew on me after a while. Did you realize what a beautiful color its eyes are? —A student of Mysteria Academy
Ogler.name: Ogler
Ogler.baseEffect: Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.

Peacemancer.baseFlair: Peace, harmony, and tranquility are all we need. War is but a futile and meaningless endeavor. Bloodstained warriors, won't you stay and listen to the words of this old man?
Peacemancer.evoFlair: It may seem like an impossible dream, but there is merit in striving for peace. Is wanting a world without conflict so wrong? If you won't listen to my words, perhaps I shall show you!
Peacemancer.name: Peacemancer

Frostrune Knight.baseFlair: O flowing, mutable water, master of gentle change and of conservation. Strengthen the essence of conservation, and become ice. Oh, just be careful not to freeze too much.—Riley, Hydroshaman
Frostrune Knight.evoFlair: We make use of the four elements through spirit mediums. However, these arts, the oldest of all magics, are currently under new threat. This is in no small part due to the steel uprising and its perversion of natural phenomena.—Magica Principia, Part 1
Frostrune Knight.name: Frostrune Knight
Frostrune Knight.baseEffect: Fanfare: If any allied amulets are in play, return 1 to your hand and transform a random enemy follower with the highest attack in play into a Snowman.

Lightning Shooter.baseFlair: Stormy clouds on high, let me be your elemental conduit!
Lightning Shooter.evoFlair: Feel my thunderous fury as I fry you to a crisp!
Lightning Shooter.name: Lightning Shooter
Lightning Shooter.baseEffect: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.Spellboost: Deal 1 more.

Flame Witch.baseFlair: Master will be proud of how far my flame-wielding technique has come. Shazah!
Flame Witch.evoFlair: Next on the list to master: wind magic. Can you imagine the flaming vortexes I'd conjure! If Master could see me now...
Flame Witch.name: Flame Witch
Flame Witch.baseEffect: Whenever you play a spell, deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Flame Witch.evoEffect: Whenever you play a spell, deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.

Illusionist.baseFlair: The best illusions sometimes surpass the originals. One young woman taught me as much. —Illusionary Magic, Chapter 2
Illusionist.evoFlair: She said illusions have lives of their own, lives that could be ended at a flick of the wrist. —Illusionary Magic, Chapter 2
Illusionist.name: Illusionist
Illusionist.baseEffect: Fanfare: Randomly summon a copy of 1 of the highest-cost allied followers that has been destroyed during this match and give it Rush. Banish it at the start of your next turn.

Centaur Shaman.baseFlair: Most mages are endowed with a natural inquisitiveness. Some view the vulnerable nature of a mortal body as a problem—one they undertake to remedy.
Centaur Shaman.evoFlair: Some mages who fuse with the demons they summon lose their minds. Others can master their new demonic bodies and retain their reason. The difference between the two is paper-thin and lies, perhaps, in that inquisitive spirit.
Centaur Shaman.name: Centaur Shaman
Centaur Shaman.baseEffect: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Gain +1/+0 and Rush.

Hanna, Mysterian Paragon.baseFlair: As your re-elected class president, I'd like to make a pledge! Let's join forces to help shape this academy into an even more splendid place to learn! I know we can do it together!
Hanna, Mysterian Paragon.evoFlair: Sure the classrooms get blown up sometimes, and students fly through the air... But that's just another part of Mysteria Academy's charm. As class president, I will ensure this academy retains that charm into the next era!
Hanna, Mysterian Paragon.name: Hanna, Mysterian Paragon
Hanna, Mysterian Paragon.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put a Mysterian Knowledge into your hand.

Mechabook Sorcerer.baseFlair: Core mutations have led to one new optimization after another. Arcane sorcerers can be divided into two groups: practitioners of the arts, and theorycrafters. Mechanized lifeforms fall in a unique space, as they are both. —Research Archives of the Sorcerer's Guild, Vol. 2
Mechabook Sorcerer.evoFlair: A new type of magical life-form... As a product, I suppose it is definitely marketable, but the logic behind such a creation needs to be checked out. I think I can provide a more... graceful solution. —Mechabook Sorcerer to a Mechanized Lifeform
Mechabook Sorcerer.name: Mechabook Sorcerer
Mechabook Sorcerer.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever you play a Machina card, recover 1 play point. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)

Sweetspell Sorcerer.baseFlair: I'm not actually fond of sweets, you know. If anything, I find them too saccharine for my taste. But the morsels they attract? Why, they're so adorable I could gobble them up. Now how about a nice toffee, my little cream puff?
Sweetspell Sorcerer.evoFlair: The more treats I conjure, the more they gather. Ahh, just look at them. With every bite their pink cheeks grow rounder. Ooh, they really are adorable. But... they've been eating for hours. Surely they've had more than enough?
Sweetspell Sorcerer.name: Sweetspell Sorcerer
Sweetspell Sorcerer.baseEffect: Whenever you play a spell, summon a Happy Pig.
Sweetspell Sorcerer.evoEffect: Evolve: Evolve all allied Happy Pigs.Whenever you play a spell, summon a Happy Pig.

Ancient Alchemist.baseFlair: A renowned pioneer of modern alchemical methods. Her unquenchable thirst for knowledge is at the root of all her achievements.
Ancient Alchemist.evoFlair: Perhaps the most refined alchemy adept. Though many follow in her footsteps, none are worthy of stepping into her shoes.
Ancient Alchemist.name: Ancient Alchemist
Ancient Alchemist.baseEffect: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Put 3 Conjure Guardians into your hand.

Magic Girl Melvie.baseFlair: How do you get to be a princess? I sure don't know, so I'll just start studying everything I can find! How'd you like to join me?
Magic Girl Melvie.evoFlair: Once I become a princess, I'll meet a handsome prince, and then we'll be together, and then, well—hee-hee-hee! I just can't wait to be a princess!
Magic Girl Melvie.name: Magic Girl Melvie
Magic Girl Melvie.baseEffect: Fanfare: Both players draw cards until each player has 7 cards in their hand.

Falise, Leonardian Mage.baseFlair: Being alone is fine with me. Go ahead and make fun of me, but I'm still going to win. That's my whole reason for living.
Falise, Leonardian Mage.evoFlair: There's no way I'll lose to some grinning fool. I'll win, and everyone will see how great I am!
Falise, Leonardian Mage.name: Falise, Leonardian Mage
Falise, Leonardian Mage.baseEffect: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of other Neutral cards in your hand.Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Evolve this follower.

Wild Golem.baseFlair: Do Not Drop Off Golems. —Mysteria Academy signboard
Wild Golem.evoFlair: Do Not Pick Up Golems. —Mysteria Academy signboard
Wild Golem.name: Wild Golem
Wild Golem.baseEffect: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Gain +1/+2.At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this X times (up to 10 times). X equals this follower's attack.
Wild Golem.evoEffect: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this X times (up to 10 times). X equals this follower's attack.

Class President Hanna.baseFlair: It's all about keeping up appearances, they say. As class president, I have to set an example for everyone!
Class President Hanna.evoFlair: As long as you set your mind to it, surely a bright future awaits you! Come on everybody, let's hit the books!
Class President Hanna.name: Class President Hanna
Class President Hanna.baseEffect: At the end of your turn, randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Mysterian Missile or Mysterian Circle. If you have played another Mysteria card this turn, put a Mysterian Rite into your hand instead.
Class President Hanna.evoEffect: At the end of your turn, randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Mysterian Missile or Mysterian Circle. If you have played another Mysteria card this turn, put a Mysterian Rite into your hand instead.

Chaos Wielder.baseFlair: From forbidden techniques to the arcane arts, I embrace all manner of spellcraft... I refuse to discriminate when it comes to knowledge.
Chaos Wielder.evoFlair: I do not adhere to any one mind-set. Taboo, truth... I'll eat my fill of it all. There is no right or wrong when it comes to knowledge.
Chaos Wielder.name: Chaos Wielder
Chaos Wielder.baseEffect: Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.----------Fanfare: Draw 2 cards.
Chaos Wielder.evoEffect: Evolve: Spellboost the cards in your hand.

Curse Crafter.baseFlair: Just as Onmyodo is on the verge of dying out, a new torchbearer appears. He learns all there is to know about the forces of yin and yang and summons powerful shikigami.—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Zai
Curse Crafter.evoFlair: Nobles and peasants alike are nothing before the shikigami. Onmyodo makes a name for itself once again, spreading throughout the world. —The Legacy of Onmyodo: Zen
Curse Crafter.name: Curse Crafter
Curse Crafter.baseEffect: Fanfare: Summon a Demonic Shikigami. Randomly put 2 different followers with Spellboost from your deck into your hand.

Sun Oracle Pascale.baseFlair: If you're looking for some motivation, check out my dance! Of course, now that you've seen it, you better win!
Sun Oracle Pascale.evoFlair: If any fools give you lip, give 'em a beatdown! What? You think I should watch my mouth? Well, I suppose you might be right.
Sun Oracle Pascale.name: Sun Oracle Pascale
Sun Oracle Pascale.baseEffect: Fanfare: Earth Rite - At the end of this turn, double all other allied followers' attack and defense if this follower is still in play.

Wizardess of Oz.baseFlair: Longface, Fanged Beast, the Sighing Beauty, or the Crimson Rose. Call me what you will. I am the void. I am a fiction. I am everyone and no one at all.
Wizardess of Oz.evoFlair: If you believe in the flickering nothing, I will give you a brain, give you a heart, and give you courage. I kneel before truth, and rule over the nothing.
Wizardess of Oz.name: Wizardess of Oz
Wizardess of Oz.baseEffect: Fanfare: Draw cards until there are 5 cards in your hand. Change the cost of the spells without Spellboost in your hand to 1.Last Words: At the start of your next turn, banish all spells in your hand.
Wizardess of Oz.evoEffect: Last Words: At the start of your next turn, banish all spells in your hand.

Mysteria, Magic Founder.baseFlair: Bestow upon them eyes to witness the miracles of magic, ears to hear the melodies of magic, and the heart to command it.
Mysteria, Magic Founder.evoFlair: To those who cast in my name, bring forth the magic within. It's always around us, and always with you.
Mysteria, Magic Founder.name: Mysteria, Magic Founder
Mysteria, Magic Founder.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Your spells deal +1 damage. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match.)

Truthseeker Faust.baseFlair: There's nothing to fear; you can spit it out! Let the desire spiral wildly within you. I'm ready to love, and coyness is the last thing I need.
Truthseeker Faust.evoFlair: Every desire is a possibility. Stay true to yourself, humans. Stay thirsty, animals. If you can just do that, I'll show you the way.
Truthseeker Faust.name: Truthseeker Faust
Truthseeker Faust.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, if an allied follower is in play, perform Earth Rite: Give +2/+1 to a random allied follower. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match.)

Orichalcum Golem.baseFlair: There is beauty in inevitability. But beauty and truth are very different things. Those seemingly forged of happenstance still play their part in the greater, unchanging design.—Chapter 4, On Golems
Orichalcum Golem.evoFlair: Third-rate mages rely on chance.Second-rate mages try to eliminate it.Only when you learn to control chance can you call yourself a first-rate mage.—Chapter 5, On Golems
Orichalcum Golem.name: Orichalcum Golem
Orichalcum Golem.baseEffect: Accelerate (1): Earth Rite (X) - Randomly activate 1 of the following effects. Do this X times. X equals the number of allied Earth Sigil amulets in play.-Summon a Clay Golem.-Put a Veridic Ritual into your hand.-Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.----------Last Words: Summon 2 Earth Essences. Put an Orichalcum Golem into your hand and change its cost to 7.
Orichalcum Golem.evoEffect: Last Words: Summon 2 Earth Essences. Put an Orichalcum Golem into your hand and change its cost to 7.

Medea, Ritual Sorceress.baseFlair: Ignorance. I won him the golden fleece. I stepped aboard the Argo. I, who foolishly, foolishly gave over my heart, now cling to the rail of this narrow ship, as the currents toss me. That was my ignorance.
Medea, Ritual Sorceress.evoFlair: Destiny. I shall burn Glauce. I will abandon Iolcus. You, wretched, wretched lover, shall grow dizzy in my embrace. This was always our destiny.
Medea, Ritual Sorceress.name: Medea, Ritual Sorceress
Medea, Ritual Sorceress.baseEffect: Fanfare and Last Words: Summon a Witch's Cauldron.Enhance (8): Summon a Guardian Golem and recover 1 evolution point.
Medea, Ritual Sorceress.evoEffect: Evolve: Earth Rite - Transform an enemy follower or amulet into a Clay Golem.Last Words: Summon a Witch's Cauldron.

Fate's Hand.baseFlair: When these cards reach enchantment, fate will move once again.
Fate's Hand.name: Fate's Hand
Fate's Hand.baseEffect: Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.----------Draw 2 cards.

Chain Lightning.baseFlair: It struck without warning, nary a cloud in the sky.
Chain Lightning.name: Chain Lightning
Chain Lightning.baseEffect: Deal 3 damage to an enemy. Put a Chain Lightning into your hand if you have 3 other cards or less in your hand.

Staff of Whirlwinds.baseFlair: Your mother never slapped you, so my winds will have to do the trick! Learn yet? Now get lost! —A mage of winds
Staff of Whirlwinds.name: Staff of Whirlwinds
Staff of Whirlwinds.baseEffect: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Then deal 1 damage to all enemies.

Golem's Rampage.baseFlair: Golem assembly must be conducted perfectly. First comes prayer, then parchment and pure silver, and finally the incantation. Take care not to confuse the steps. Tragically, many mages have been crushed by their own golems. —Golem Basics: A Primer, Chapter 8
Golem's Rampage.name: Golem's Rampage
Golem's Rampage.baseEffect: Summon 2 Clay Golems.Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of allied Clay Golems in play.Earth Rite: Give +1/+1 to all allied Clay Golems.

Mysterian Rite.baseFlair: Worry not, my beloved students. Your days of study and training will be the key to unlocking the secrets of magic. —Seraph of Mysteria
Mysterian Rite.name: Mysterian Rite
Mysterian Rite.baseEffect: Whenever you play a Mysteria card, if this card costs 5 play points, change its cost to 3.----------Deal 3 damage to an enemy.Summon a Guardian Golem.

Golem Protection.baseFlair: Clumps of earth, heed my call and be my shield!
Golem Protection.name: Golem Protection
Golem Protection.baseEffect: Summon a Guardian Golem.Earth Rite: Give +2/+2 to allied Guardian Golems.

Disintegration.baseFlair: The culmination of millions of happenstances brought you into existence. It would only take one more to take you out of it.
Disintegration.name: Disintegration
Disintegration.baseEffect: Banish an enemy follower.If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, recover 4 play points.

Winter's Caprice.baseFlair: They look better in white anyway, don't you think?
Winter's Caprice.name: Winter's Caprice
Winter's Caprice.baseEffect: Transform each follower into a Snowman.

Rimewind.baseFlair: The witch's breath coalesced into a bitter snowstorm.
Rimewind.name: Rimewind
Rimewind.baseEffect: Return an enemy follower with 1 defense or less to the opponent's hand and summon 1 Snowman.Spellboost: Followers with 1 more defense can be returned and summon 1 more Snowman.

Conjuring Force.name: Conjuring Force
Conjuring Force.baseEffect: Whenever you play a spell, give +1/+0 to all allied followers.

Emergency Summoning.baseFlair: A little late now, aren't we? —Accomplished Mage
Emergency Summoning.name: Emergency Summoning
Emergency Summoning.baseEffect: When your opponent plays a follower, destroy this amulet.Last Words: Summon a Guardian Golem and a Clay Golem.

Reactive Barrier.name: Reactive Barrier
Reactive Barrier.baseEffect: When your opponent plays a spell, destroy this amulet.Last Words: Draw 3 cards and restore 3 defense to your leader.

Master Alchemist.baseFlair: Our combined thirst for knowledge was the key to unlocking the arcane mysteries of the God of Creation's methods.
Master Alchemist.evoFlair: Do I fear what depravities may come as a result of my unnatural creations? Not if they can stop my old companion who was claimed by the darkness.
Master Alchemist.name: Master Alchemist
Master Alchemist.baseEffect: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Put a Conjure Guardian into your hand.

Spurned Witch.baseFlair: Hear me, insatiable staff! Feed on the flesh of all those who saw me banished to oblivion!
Spurned Witch.evoFlair: My gratitude alone will never sate your appetite, so this I pledge: we shall walk this land together until you hunger no more.
Spurned Witch.name: Spurned Witch
Spurned Witch.baseEffect: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.

Blade Mage.baseFlair: You've gone too far, vile beasts. We cannot allow you to continue. My blade will be your judge, jury, and executioner.
Blade Mage.evoFlair: Flee and be cut down or surrender and be cut down. It makes no difference to me, as your death is foreordained. Our targets never escape justice, so say goodbye.
Blade Mage.name: Blade Mage
Blade Mage.baseEffect: Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.----------Storm.

Astrologist of the Mist.baseFlair: The people's wishes call to the stars; the stars' light calls for these wishes. Wishes are the bridge that connect us with the stars.
Astrologist of the Mist.evoFlair: If people forget the stars, then stars will forget the people. I continue praying to the star globe so this doesn't happen.
Astrologist of the Mist.name: Astrologist of the Mist
Astrologist of the Mist.baseEffect: Fanfare: If another allied follower is in play, perform Earth Rite - Give +1/+1 and Ward to an allied follower.

Gem Golem.baseFlair: Shielding the advancing army all the while, a magic-powered giant laid siege to its enemies. Not even the mightiest sorcery could halt it.
Gem Golem.evoFlair: Across the battlefield there strode a giant, a living shield to protect its allies from the magical onslaught of fire, ice, and lightning.
Gem Golem.name: Gem Golem
Gem Golem.baseEffect: Ward.Fanfare: Earth Rite - Gain resistance to targeted enemy spells and effects.

Witchcrafter Magisa.baseFlair: It's your lucky day. I rarely agree to perform a private magic show. Tell me, you don't get the chills easily, do you?
Witchcrafter Magisa.evoFlair: Oh, don't you be embarrassed. I have a knack for bewitching all my first-timers. Sit a while, won't you? I'll craft you up somethin' good.
Witchcrafter Magisa.name: Witchcrafter Magisa
Witchcrafter Magisa.baseEffect: Whenever you play a spell, summon a Clay Golem.
Witchcrafter Magisa.evoEffect: Whenever you play a spell, summon a Clay Golem.

Shadow Witch.baseFlair: You're repulsive! This new form suits you better.
Shadow Witch.evoFlair: You're just so repulsive! I'll do us both a favor and put you out of your misery.
Shadow Witch.name: Shadow Witch
Shadow Witch.baseEffect: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Transform an enemy follower or amulet into a Clay Golem.

Disaster Witch.baseFlair: An intruder? In my castle? Well, I suppose I'll welcome them by making them comfortable... and of course warm. Immolated even!
Disaster Witch.evoFlair: You're a brave one... and incredibly stupid. I once razed a city in an instant, and I'll do the same to you!
Disaster Witch.name: Disaster Witch
Disaster Witch.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put a Crimson Sorcery into your hand.

Mr. Heinlein, Shadow Mage.baseFlair: You mustn't, my students, discount the field of shadow magic. It's able to destroy any object and lead people's hearts astray.
Mr. Heinlein, Shadow Mage.evoFlair: It seems there are some of you, my students, who don't yet understand the power of shadow magic. So allow me to demonstrate its terrible potential!
Mr. Heinlein, Shadow Mage.name: Mr. Heinlein, Shadow Mage
Mr. Heinlein, Shadow Mage.baseEffect: Ward.Fanfare: If there are cards in your hand that have been Spellboosted fewer than 5 times, Spellboost those cards until they have been Spellboosted a total of 5 times.

Mysterian Whitewyrm.baseFlair: Turn, my flesh, into a whitewyrm. I shall shine the light of purification on the ignorant ones who set foot in this house of learning.
Mysterian Whitewyrm.evoFlair: The art of wyrmification is forbidden, but if this power can protect the future, then I'll wield the light any number of times!
Mysterian Whitewyrm.name: Mysterian Whitewyrm
Mysterian Whitewyrm.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put a Mysterian Circle into your hand. Give all Mysteria spells in your hand the following effect - Draw 1 card.

Mysterian Blackwyrm.baseFlair: Turn, my flesh, into a blackwyrm. I shall pour the dark of destruction on the wicked ones who defile the house of learning.
Mysterian Blackwyrm.evoFlair: The art of wyrmification is forbidden, but if this power can destroy evil, then I'll release the darkness any number of times!
Mysterian Blackwyrm.name: Mysterian Blackwyrm
Mysterian Blackwyrm.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put a Mysterian Missile into your hand. Give all Mysteria spells in your hand the following effect - Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.

Eldritch Chimera.baseFlair: I've made my choice. You'll be trampled by this one. —Abyss Summoner
Eldritch Chimera.evoFlair: I've made my choice. You can be decimated to bits by this one. —Abyss Summoner
Eldritch Chimera.name: Eldritch Chimera
Eldritch Chimera.baseEffect: Ward.Can't be destroyed by spells and effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from spells and effects.)

Eldritch Demon.baseFlair: I've made my choice. You'll be breakfast for this one. —Abyss Summoner
Eldritch Demon.evoFlair: I've made my choice. You can be a sacrifice for this one. —Abyss Summoner
Eldritch Demon.name: Eldritch Demon
Eldritch Demon.baseEffect: Storm.At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to this follower.

Professor of Taboos.baseFlair: If it means saving my daughter, I would never hesitate to turn to the forbidden arts, even if doing so is unforgivable.
Professor of Taboos.evoFlair: Forbidden arts. Blasphemy. The gods will likely never forgive me. And yet those same gods failed to save my sweet daughter, so I must!
Professor of Taboos.name: Professor of Taboos
Professor of Taboos.baseEffect: Whenever an enemy follower is destroyed during your turn, summon a Zombie.At the end of your turn, perform Earth Rite: Destroy a random enemy follower.
Professor of Taboos.evoEffect: Whenever an enemy follower is destroyed during your turn, summon a Zombie.At the end of your turn, perform Earth Rite: Destroy a random enemy follower.

Master Mage Levi.baseFlair: Who am I? Humph! If it matters to you, I'm the greatest mage in all the world.
Master Mage Levi.evoFlair: The man who stands before you has explored the ultimate limits of magic. If you value your life, step away from me!
Master Mage Levi.name: Master Mage Levi
Master Mage Levi.baseEffect: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy.Fanfare: Earth Rite - Deal 3 damage to all enemies instead.

Hulking Giant.baseFlair: Begin with nothing. Then infuse a magical soul into a lump of earth to create a golem, which is something. Next magically enhance the golem until it grows into a giant. That giant will crush all before it, leaving you with nothing. —Introduction, The Basics of Truth
Hulking Giant.evoFlair: The secrets of alchemy lie in focus and forgetfulness. You should focus only on how to succeed at creation and forget about controlling what you create. Keep this in mind and you'll create something great indeed. —Chapter 3, The Basics of Truth
Hulking Giant.name: Hulking Giant
Hulking Giant.baseEffect: Fanfare: Discard all Earth Sigil amulets from your hand and gain +2/+2 for each discarded card.Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Hulking Giant.evoEffect: Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.

Arulumaya, Mystic Seer.baseFlair: I'm sorry, but I use my powers for the people. I don't divine for individuals. But suppose I told you that calamity awaits you on your journey... Would you give everything up?
Arulumaya, Mystic Seer.evoFlair: There is a future I cannot see, one in which the world will tremble as it hurtles toward the crossroads of fate. You, the bearer of this destiny... Which path will you choose? I ask that you let me watch over you as you continue your journey.
Arulumaya, Mystic Seer.name: Arulumaya, Mystic Seer
Arulumaya, Mystic Seer.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, if there are at least 6 cards in your hand, Spellboost the cards in your hand; if there are 5 cards or less in your hand, draw cards until there are 6 cards in your hand. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Arulumaya, Mystic Seer.evoEffect: Evolve: If there are at least 6 cards in your hand, Spellboost the cards in your hand; if there are 5 cards or less in your hand, draw cards until there are 6 cards in your hand.

Despondent Chimera.baseFlair: Their transgressions piled on as they lost sight of their ethics and morals. What was once the desire for truth was twisted into a depraved pleasure. Before long, they entered a realm inhuman.
Despondent Chimera.evoFlair: Their transgressions grew inhumane as they thirsted for the forbidden fruit. But the aftermath was an unmistakable anomaly—they awakened to the sound of an unspeakable horror, finally coming to realize their mistakes.
Despondent Chimera.name: Despondent Chimera
Despondent Chimera.baseEffect: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower if this card has been Spellboosted at least 6 times.Then, recover 3 play points if this card has been Spellboosted at least 9 times.Then, gain Storm if this card has been Spellboosted at least 12 times.

Sweet-Tooth Medusa.baseFlair: Magical Girl Sweet-Tooth Medusa is on the scene! Love and passion! Sugar Time! Magical Light... Sparking!Phew! Being a magical girl sure isn't easy!
Sweet-Tooth Medusa.evoFlair: Hate will never be enough to defeat the forces of evil! So I'll wrap them up in my love!Evildoers the world over... I'll send you back where you came from!
Sweet-Tooth Medusa.name: Sweet-Tooth Medusa
Sweet-Tooth Medusa.baseEffect: Fanfare: Summon 1 Serpent.Spellboost: Summon 1 more.If this card has been Spellboosted at least 7 times, summon a Medusiana instead.

Erasmus, Master Summoner.baseFlair: The men retreated in terror as a master of arcane spells stood before them. "Heh," the wizard chuckled with mild amusement, "this should make for a good warmup." —Ancient War Records, Recovered Fragment
Erasmus, Master Summoner.evoFlair: The wizard's spells blew them away in a single breath. Seeing the men fall so easily before him, he sighs in disappointment. It seems he had only just begun. —Ancient War Records, Recovered Fragment
Erasmus, Master Summoner.name: Erasmus, Master Summoner
Erasmus, Master Summoner.baseEffect: At the end of your turn, deal 4 damage to a random enemy follower.At the end of your turn, perform Earth Rite: Deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.

Karyl, Catty Sorceress.baseFlair: Geez... Fine! I'll help you fight, so you'd better be grateful! But get in my way, and it's all over for you. Got it?
Karyl, Catty Sorceress.evoFlair: The truth is, I can't let myself get too close to them. If anything were to happen to them, I'd be the one to suffer... What's that look for? You got a problem?
Karyl, Catty Sorceress.name: Karyl, Catty Sorceress
Karyl, Catty Sorceress.baseEffect: Fanfare: Reduce the enemy leader's maximum defense by 5. Union Burst (10): Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower and then 1 damage to the enemy leader. Do this 5 times.
Karyl, Catty Sorceress.evoEffect: Evolve: Destroy all enemy followers with 3 defense or less.

Adamantine Golem.baseFlair: Curiosity is the hallmark of a researcher. One idea inspires ten theories which are then honed by one hundred experiments, and then at last—eureka! The history of magic is built on moments such as these.—On Golems (New Edition), Chapter 2
Adamantine Golem.evoFlair: It took mankind a hundred flashes of inspiration to form armies to defend their common interest. It took ten to hone an affinity for the arcane. But it only takes one for magic to thrive and stay alive.—On Golems (New Edition), Chapter 3
Adamantine Golem.name: Adamantine Golem
Adamantine Golem.baseEffect: During your turn, when this card is added to your hand from your deck, if there are 2 allied Earth Sigil amulets or less in play, reveal it and summon an Earth Essence.----------Fanfare: Randomly activate 1 of the following effects. Earth Rite (X): Do this X more times. X equals the number of allied Earth Sigil amulets in play.-Summon a Guardian Golem.-Put a Witch Snap into your hand and change its cost to 0.-Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader. Restore 2 defense to your leader.

Truth's Adjudication.baseFlair: The gates of truth are fashioned from the nature, instinct, and reality of this plane. Throw them open, and never shall they close again.
Truth's Adjudication.name: Truth's Adjudication
Truth's Adjudication.baseEffect: Summon a Guardian Golem and give it +X/+X. Deal Y damage to the enemy leader. Restore Z defense to your leader. X, Y, and Z equal the number of times this card has been Spellboosted, split randomly between the three effects.

Crimson Meteor Storm.baseFlair: A witch's patience: mage slang for something that doesn't exist.
Crimson Meteor Storm.name: Crimson Meteor Storm
Crimson Meteor Storm.baseEffect: Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers.If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, put a Crimson Sorcery into your hand.

Arcane Enlightenment.baseFlair: Mysteries are like little treasure chests of truth. Without a key they're worse than useless. But with one their significance is limitless.
Arcane Enlightenment.name: Arcane Enlightenment

Calamitous Curse.baseFlair: Though the armored horde bellowed, the wizard needed only to murmur.
Calamitous Curse.name: Calamitous Curse
Calamitous Curse.baseEffect: Banish all enemy followers with 2 defense or less.Earth Rite: Banish all enemy followers with 5 defense or less instead.

Mutagenic Bolt.name: Mutagenic Bolt
Mutagenic Bolt.baseEffect: Transform each enemy follower into a Flame Rat.

Grand Summoning.baseFlair: Do not grieve my departure when my time in this world ends. I shall bestow upon you a new companion, born from this earth.
Grand Summoning.name: Grand Summoning
Grand Summoning.baseEffect: Earth Rite: Give +1/+0 to all allied followers, including followers summoned by this card.Summon a Guardian Golem, a Clay Golem, and a Scrap Golem.

Second Curse.baseFlair: This unyielding curse echoes again and again.
Second Curse.name: Second Curse
Second Curse.baseEffect: Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower.Put a Final Curse into your hand.

Servant of Truth.baseFlair: Our way is truth. Yours is deception. Your name, your rank, even your intentions—all deceit. Cast them aside and the truth will reveal itself to you.
Servant of Truth.evoFlair: The First Rite: Know Thy DeceptionThis world is rife with falsehood. Lies, fabrications, and guile—the untrue takes many forms. Thou must know them all. —Teachings of the Assembly of Truth
Servant of Truth.name: Servant of Truth
Servant of Truth.baseEffect: Accelerate (2): Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.----------Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.

Traditional Sorcerer.baseFlair: Onmyodo is not merely a form of divination—it is power. With a talisman and a string of words, the user can bend monstrosities and calamities to their will.—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Sha
Traditional Sorcerer.evoFlair: As the true potential of Onmyodo comes to light, it begins to see use in battle. Swords are no match for its power, and it shatters armor with ease. A single strike is able to take out numerous enemies.—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Kai
Traditional Sorcerer.name: Traditional Sorcerer
Traditional Sorcerer.baseEffect: Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.----------Fanfare: Summon a Paper Shikigami.Whenever an allied Paper Shikigami or Demonic Shikigami comes into play, give it Ward.
Traditional Sorcerer.evoEffect: Whenever an allied Paper Shikigami or Demonic Shikigami comes into play, give it Ward.

Dragonbond Mage.baseFlair: Most mages' origins are steeped in mystery. This one's, however, is not—he made a blood pact with a dragon deity.
Dragonbond Mage.evoFlair: To gain the trust of a dragon god, one must command unrivaled sorcery. Do so, and aerial domination will be all but assured.
Dragonbond Mage.name: Dragonbond Mage
Dragonbond Mage.baseEffect: Whenever you play a spell, summon a Dragon.
Dragonbond Mage.evoEffect: Whenever you play a spell, summon a Dragon.

Snowman King.baseFlair: This winter sure's nasty! Someone, anyone! Come warm up your king!
Snowman King.evoFlair: Hohoho, that's better. I'm nice and toasty now. Huh, now you're chilly? Well, how about you think of someone beside yourself?
Snowman King.name: Snowman King
Snowman King.baseEffect: Fanfare: Choose - Summon 1 Snow Knight or {1@Wild Snowman@Wild Snowmen}. Spellboost: Summon 1 more.

Bergent, Onion Patchmaster.baseFlair: The world rejected me, so I'll reject the world. I've said it, and I mean it! Now come here, my beautiful little servants!
Bergent, Onion Patchmaster.evoFlair: Gwaaah, why won't anything go my way? I'm not going to give up though. I'll destroy this whole world no matter what!
Bergent, Onion Patchmaster.name: Bergent, Onion Patchmaster
Bergent, Onion Patchmaster.baseEffect: Fanfare: Summon an Onion Patch. Give your leader the following effect - Whenever you play a spell, summon an Onion Patch. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)

Ms. Miranda, Light Mage.baseFlair: Hi there, everyone! I'm Ms. Miranda, your light arts teacher! But you can just call me Mira!
Ms. Miranda, Light Mage.evoFlair: In order to really understand my students, it's all about appearances, right? Well, how's this? It doesn't fit quite like it used to, but I think it'll be okay. Yay!
Ms. Miranda, Light Mage.name: Ms. Miranda, Light Mage
Ms. Miranda, Light Mage.baseEffect: Whenever you play a Mysteria card, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.---------Fanfare: Randomly put a Mysterian Missile or Mysterian Circle into your hand.
Ms. Miranda, Light Mage.evoEffect: Evolve: Put a Mysterian Rite into your hand.

Morra, Monika's Familiar.baseFlair: We help magical girls turn their love and hope into power! That's the job of us familiars! So you've gotta dream big, Monika—and love even bigger! I'll be able to give you tons of power then!
Morra, Monika's Familiar.evoFlair: A pure heart, a sweet costume change, and a metric fluff ton of unyielding love—Monika, everything you need to be magical is inside of you! Now... Transform!
Morra, Monika's Familiar.name: Morra, Monika's Familiar
Morra, Monika's Familiar.baseEffect: Accelerate (3): Recover 1 evolution point.---------- Fanfare: Summon a Lovely-Heart Monika. Recover 1 evolution point.Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put a Morra, Monika's Familiar into your hand.
Morra, Monika's Familiar.evoEffect: Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put a Morra, Monika's Familiar into your hand.

Raio, Omen of Truth.baseFlair: Drenched in the rain of knowledge, where dost thou wander? Why deceive thyself with intentions and ambitions? 'Tis inane affectation. Expose thyself to the deepest truths—the qualities, faculties, and reality of this plane. And then... I shall put this world to trial.
Raio, Omen of Truth.evoFlair: To want for purpose is deception; to wish for meaning is deceit. Understand the deepest truths and thou shalt manifest only that which must be. And then... I shall put this world to trial.
Raio, Omen of Truth.name: Raio, Omen of Truth
Raio, Omen of Truth.baseEffect: Fanfare: Spellboost all the cards in your deck 9 times.

Apex Elemental.baseFlair: Wind, water, fire, earth. Volatility, conservation, ascension, and gravity. Domains of the Sylphs, Undines, Salamandra, and Gnomes. Four elements who write the very laws of existence. Surpass this world and redefine it as you will.
Apex Elemental.evoFlair: Wind, water, fire, earth. Volatility, conservation, ascension, and gravity. Domains of the Sylphs, Undines, Salamandra, and Gnomes. Four pinnacles which orchestrate existence. Surpass this world, and bestow unto us your gestalt.
Apex Elemental.name: Apex Elemental
Apex Elemental.baseEffect: Accelerate (1): Return an allied amulet to your hand and deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. If the returned card is a Naterran Great Tree, deal 3 damage instead. (Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)---------- Ward.Fanfare: If any allied amulets are in play, return 1 to your hand and deal 2 damage to all enemy followers. If the returned card is a Naterran Great Tree, deal 3 damage instead.

Ultimate Clay Golem.baseFlair: Oooo!(Humanity... Foolish creators. I stand before you as the manifestation of truths, born from the depths of wisdom—the absolute golem to reign supreme. Now behold, as I prove to you all the strength of my will.)
Ultimate Clay Golem.evoFlair: Oooo, ooo!(Humanity... Lonesome creators. My mothers, my fathers stuck in the quagmire of reason. I have already surpassed you. Now witness, as I show the ultimate truth!)
Ultimate Clay Golem.name: Ultimate Clay Golem
Ultimate Clay Golem.baseEffect: This follower can evolve for 0 evolution points.
Ultimate Clay Golem.evoEffect: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - During your turn, whenever an allied Clay Golem comes into play, transform it into an Ultimate Clay Golem. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)

Twin Guardians.baseFlair: Alchemists build walls that have wills of their own. That's the difference between us and carpenters.
Twin Guardians.name: Twin Guardians
Twin Guardians.baseEffect: Summon 2 Guardian Golems. Earth Rite: Give +1/+1 to allied Guardian Golems.

Expel Soul.baseFlair: Pain, pain, go away. See, now doesn't that feel better?
Expel Soul.name: Expel Soul
Expel Soul.baseEffect: Destroy an enemy follower. Draw 1 card.Spellboost: Draw 1 more.

Alchemical Lore.baseFlair: There's no need for the power of tigers. Not when you can just summon a dragon.
Alchemical Lore.name: Alchemical Lore
Alchemical Lore.baseEffect: Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers.

Multipart Experiment.baseFlair: Quantity over quality! Am I right or am I right?
Multipart Experiment.name: Multipart Experiment

Enchanted Sword.baseFlair: Feel the power of the enchanted sword!
Enchanted Sword.name: Enchanted Sword
Enchanted Sword.baseEffect: Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.----------Give +2/+2 to an allied follower.

Edict of Truth.baseFlair: Hear me, all living creatures: Be governed by instinct. Open wide your slavering jaws to devour sadness and joy alike. Only then shall we seize upon the truth.
Edict of Truth.name: Edict of Truth
Edict of Truth.baseEffect: Draw cards until there are 9 cards in your hand.If this card has been Spellboosted at least 9 times, recover 7 play points.

Seal of Solomon.baseFlair: A mere fragment of the king's infinite wisdom.
Seal of Solomon.name: Seal of Solomon
Seal of Solomon.baseEffect: Randomly put 1 of the highest-cost followers that cost X play points or less from your deck into your hand and change its cost to 0. X equals the number of times this card has been Spellboosted.

Juno's Secret Laboratory.baseFlair: Whoa, this could be huge! What's that word again? Oh yeah—eureka!
Juno's Secret Laboratory.name: Juno's Secret Laboratory
Juno's Secret Laboratory.baseEffect: Countdown (3)Fanfare: Earth Rite - Summon a Guardian Golem.At the end of your turn, summon a Guardian Golem.

Arcane Item Shop.baseFlair: A faint, insinuating voice guides your footsteps, and you find yourself before an unassuming storefront. Inside that establishment long forgotten by the masses, you feel the heat of countless stares. Selections here are made by the items, you realize, not the customers.
Arcane Item Shop.name: Arcane Item Shop
Arcane Item Shop.baseEffect: Invocation: At the start of your tenth turn or later, if you can evolve and have at least 1 evolution point, use 1 evolution point and invoke this card.Until this amulet leaves play give your leader the following effects: Whenever you play a card deal 2 damage to a random enemy. Whenever you play a card, if there are no followers in your deck, recover 1 play point.

Magiblade Witch.baseFlair: Tremble in fear before my power! O, brilliant red! Dwell within my hand and shine... Huh? You think my incantation's too long? That's my strategy, silly! Enemies think I'm going to cast a spell, so they drop their guard and get closer... Then I just use my sword instead!
Magiblade Witch.evoFlair: As a magic user who wields a sword, there are a lot of things I'd like to say to her... But there's no point preaching to a mage that they're doing it wrong. —Blade Mage
Magiblade Witch.name: Magiblade Witch
Magiblade Witch.baseEffect: Accelerate (1): Summon an Earth Essence.---------- Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to 2 random enemy followers.

Twinblade Mage.baseFlair: The righteous mage witnessed it for himself—a bane his sword could not break. An eye for an eye, a curse for a curse. The knight's two swords seemed to bring down a curse on the accursed beasts.
Twinblade Mage.evoFlair: The wielder shows no mercy to those who would be cut down, for the twin blades that mete out curses on the accursed beasts. The justice he believed has long perished, but his determination is undying.
Twinblade Mage.name: Twinblade Mage
Twinblade Mage.baseEffect: Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.----------Storm.Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.

Abyss Summoner.baseFlair: It's all about method and attention to detail, you know. I guess you could call it dedication to the craft? Anyway, I'm obviously gonna destroy you here, so... Which pup should I do it with?
Abyss Summoner.evoFlair: Sure, a result is something you can be proud of, but the process is something you can really savor. Anyway, clearly you're gonna get torn to shreds here—just give me a second to choose how.
Abyss Summoner.name: Abyss Summoner
Abyss Summoner.baseEffect: Fanfare: If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, Choose - Summon an Eldritch Chimera or Eldritch Demon.

Demoncaller.baseFlair: The people grow suspicious of Onmyodo. It is not truth as they had once thought, but power. What kind of power, none can say.—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Jin
Demoncaller.evoFlair: The number of Onmyodo practitioners is small. They are unable to defend themselves from the pointed words of so many. Having lost the trust of the people, they are driven from the capital.—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Retsu
Demoncaller.name: Demoncaller
Demoncaller.baseEffect: Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.----------Fanfare: Summon a Demonic Shikigami.Whenever an allied Paper Shikigami or Demonic Shikigami comes into play, give it +1/+0 and Rush.
Demoncaller.evoEffect: Whenever an allied Paper Shikigami or Demonic Shikigami comes into play, give it +1/+0 and Rush.

Anne, Belle of Mysteria.baseFlair: Are you new to Mysteria Academy? I'm Anne, and this is Grea! Looking forward to studying together!
Anne, Belle of Mysteria.evoFlair: I love this academy! Nothing would make me happier than if you learn to love it too!
Anne, Belle of Mysteria.name: Anne, Belle of Mysteria
Anne, Belle of Mysteria.baseEffect: Fanfare: Summon a Grea the Dragonborn and evolve it.
Anne, Belle of Mysteria.evoEffect: Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.

Elder Mage of Dragonlore.baseFlair: "True magic is that which lies beyond human knowledge, so dragons are a type of magic." The elder mage muttered the words to his acolytes. "There is value in understanding dragons, value that makes sacrificing one's human form a small price to pay."
Elder Mage of Dragonlore.evoFlair: "Study the wings of the dragon to learn to fly, and study its fangs and claws to learn to rend the earth asunder." As the elder mage spoke these words, its scaled master roared. "One roar is worth a thousand words. This is true learning!"
Elder Mage of Dragonlore.name: Elder Mage of Dragonlore
Elder Mage of Dragonlore.baseEffect: Fanfare: Summon a Dragon.Fanfare: Earth Rite - Summon a Windblast Dragon instead.

Arch Summoner Erasmus.baseFlair: No respect, I tell ya! No wonder the world's torn asunder! Never mind though—a job's a job. Now lemme warm up my staff.
Arch Summoner Erasmus.evoFlair: Not a scratch, huh? Maybe I've lost my touch after all. Or maybe you're Death, waitin' to take what's owed, eh? Then gimme ya best, pal!
Arch Summoner Erasmus.name: Arch Summoner Erasmus
Arch Summoner Erasmus.baseEffect: At the end of your turn, deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower.
Arch Summoner Erasmus.evoEffect: At the end of your turn, deal 7 damage to a random enemy follower.

Silver Blade Golem.baseFlair: As the world is filled with sin, so shall its veins be with a magical lifeforce. Its purpose is but one—with sin, comes punishment.
Silver Blade Golem.evoFlair: All sins will meet their judgment without discrimination. Until the world has been purified once more, this armor shall not rest.
Silver Blade Golem.name: Silver Blade Golem
Silver Blade Golem.baseEffect: Ward.Fanfare: Transform all Earth Sigil amulets in your hand into Veridic Rituals. Then perform Earth Rite (X): Put X Veridic Rituals into your hand. X equals the number of Earth Sigil amulets in play.

Forbidden Darkmage.baseFlair: Causality is equivalent to truth. Zero is zero. One hundred is one hundred. That balance is forever unchanging... or it was. However, now the forbidden arts make a mockery of causality.
Forbidden Darkmage.evoFlair: Both nothingness and infinity are now possible. Equality can be rewritten, distorted, using a taboo practice capable of deceiving the heavens. Beyond the bounds of reason, the mage smiles calmly.
Forbidden Darkmage.name: Forbidden Darkmage
Forbidden Darkmage.baseEffect: Crystallize (1): Earth SigilYour leader can't take more than 4 damage at a time.At the start of your turn, perform Earth Rite: If an earlier-played Earth Sigil amulet is destroyed this way, restore 1 defense to your leader.At the end of your turn, draw a card.----------Fanfare: Gain +X/+X. X equals the number of allied Earth Sigil amulets destroyed this match. Deal Y damage to an enemy. Y equals this follower's attack.

Daria, Infinity Witch.baseFlair: Time, space, dimension, fate... These are normally linchpins of reality, but the grinning witch picked through them all like faulty locks."Uh, how about a real challenge?"
Daria, Infinity Witch.evoFlair: The grinning witch mocks the impossible as easily as she grasps the infinite. Unbridled and free, her power is always on display."With a bang and a boom!"
Daria, Infinity Witch.name: Daria, Infinity Witch
Daria, Infinity Witch.baseEffect: Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.----------Fanfare: Draw cards until your hand is full or you draw a card without Spellboost. Spellboost those cards 3 times.

Fiery Embrace.baseFlair: A single caress burns, but an embrace turns you to ash.
Fiery Embrace.name: Fiery Embrace
Fiery Embrace.baseEffect: Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.----------Destroy an enemy follower.

Zealot of Truth.baseFlair: Our way is truth. Yours is deception. Rid yourself of all but that which is true, and only the veracious will walk the earth.
Zealot of Truth.evoFlair: Devour falsehoods beneath the shadow of rites. Seekers of truth shall eradicate the false, and all that remains shall be known as truth.
Zealot of Truth.name: Zealot of Truth
Zealot of Truth.baseEffect: Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.----------Storm.

Aethereal Golem.baseFlair: For components within the prime field, used iron as the medium. Potential was middling. Notably, seems to command other golems. Not intentional result. Failure?—Note on a Researcher's Desk
Aethereal Golem.evoFlair: Observation about golem: Uses magic elements itself and builds friends. My only talent is experimentation. Subject seems more human than myself.—Note on a Researcher's Desk
Aethereal Golem.name: Aethereal Golem
Aethereal Golem.baseEffect: Crystallize (2): Earth SigilFanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.---------- Fanfare: Deal 6 damage to an enemy follower.

Chimera.baseFlair: I created it for fun, but it ended up being three times meaner and hungrier than I expected. Talk about triple trouble. —A young alchemist
Chimera.evoFlair: I raised it for fun, but it ended up being four times meaner and hungrier than I expected. How big does this thing get anyway? —A young alchemist
Chimera.name: Chimera
Chimera.baseEffect: Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.----------Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.

Anne, Mysterian Prodigy.baseFlair: For the academy and everyone in it, I'm going to unleash my true power—no holding back! You're gonna see what I'm made of!
Anne, Mysterian Prodigy.evoFlair: I'm not scared of a fight... What frightens me is the thought of my friends getting hurt. So I'll protect them, whatever it takes!
Anne, Mysterian Prodigy.name: Anne, Mysterian Prodigy
Anne, Mysterian Prodigy.baseEffect: Whenever you play a Mysteria card, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.----------Fanfare: Choose - Put an Anne's Summoning or Anne's Sorcery into your hand.

Riley, Hydroshaman.baseFlair: O flowing, mutable water, master of gentle change and of conservation. Cardinal direction: West. Domain of the Undines. You who chill and irrigate. Please, rest easy. We are here for you.
Riley, Hydroshaman.evoFlair: O flowing, mutable water, master of gentle change and of conservation. Cardinal direction: West. Domain of the Undines. You who chill and irrigate. It isn't that I crave power... but my companion is angry.
Riley, Hydroshaman.name: Riley, Hydroshaman
Riley, Hydroshaman.baseEffect: Storm.Invocation: At the start of your turn, if X is at least 7, invoke this card.When this follower comes into play, gain +X/+0. X equals the number of allied Naterran Great Trees you've played this match.

Mythril Golem.baseFlair: A mad alchemist's creation. Though he lost his master, he rages on, compelled to carry out the alchemist's orders.
Mythril Golem.evoFlair: Staring at the white castle walls that conceal his chained master, he clenches his graveled fists and then strikes.
Mythril Golem.name: Mythril Golem
Mythril Golem.baseEffect: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.Spellboost: Deal 1 more.

Daria, Dimensional Witch.baseFlair: A witch who left the world far behind and lives outside the confines of nature's laws. Her magic alters the face of reality.
Daria, Dimensional Witch.evoFlair: With but a murmur, the witch transcends barriers and boundaries, as well as distances and dimensions. Her blazing scarlet eyes see futures others can't even dream of.
Daria, Dimensional Witch.name: Daria, Dimensional Witch
Daria, Dimensional Witch.baseEffect: Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.----------Fanfare: Banish all cards in your hand. Then draw 5 cards and Spellboost them 5 times.

Wordwielder Ginger.baseFlair: A wordwielder who can curse a person, a city, or the very essence of a thing with but a single word. When her lips part, calamity slithers forth.
Wordwielder Ginger.evoFlair: The words she whispers drift into the sky and coalesce into disaster. She yearns for tiny misfortunes, silent death, and widespread ruin.
Wordwielder Ginger.name: Wordwielder Ginger
Wordwielder Ginger.baseEffect: Fanfare: Change the cost of all followers in your hand to 0. Give allied followers the inability to attack the enemy leader. Give allied followers that come into play the inability to attack the enemy leader (if this card is still in play). Give your leader the following effect: Fanfare effects will not activate. These effects will last until the end of the turn this card is played.

Giant Chimera.baseFlair: Their grimoires were comprehensive, and their experiments were superlative. But a god named caprice would make it all crumble to dust. —Terminus Necessarius, Chapter 3
Giant Chimera.evoFlair: Mankind's self-guided destiny is worthless before the caprice that gods employ. Our endeavors, therefore, lie prostrate before the whims of the gods. —Terminus Necessarius, Chapter 12
Giant Chimera.name: Giant Chimera
Giant Chimera.baseEffect: Fanfare: Deal a pool of 3 damage divided between all enemies. First deal damage to the earliest-played enemy follower. (If there is enough damage in the pool, deal damage equal to that follower's defense.) Then deal damage to other enemy followers in the order they were played. If any damage is left in the pool afterward, deal it to the enemy leader.Spellboost: Deal 1 more damage.

Unbodied Witch.baseFlair: A voice to agitate all within my skull. A groan. She had reconstructed the very essence of my being. It was then that I had a realization: "Yes, magic, in truth, is..." —Grimy scrap of paper
Unbodied Witch.evoFlair: A voice, a groan, and the tune's meaning gradually became clear to me. She reconstructed me as I should be. Ah, I'm through, but how very wonderful... —Grimy scrap of paper
Unbodied Witch.name: Unbodied Witch
Unbodied Witch.baseEffect: Ward.Fanfare: Select a card in your hand, and put copies of it into your hand until it is full. (A hand can hold 9 cards.)At the start of your turn, evolve this follower.
Unbodied Witch.evoEffect: (Doesn't have Ward.)Strike: Spellboost the cards in your hand 10 times.

Ginger, Accursed Word.baseFlair: A wordwielder who would bring forth disaster. A demon who would bring forth unspeakable terror. Through their fated encounter, an exchanging of words—the birth of love. For this is Ville de l'Amour, a town brimming with the miracles of love. —Ville de l'Amour, An Encounter
Ginger, Accursed Word.evoFlair: A wordwielder who believed not in true love. She uttered to the demon, "If your love was born of a curse, perish before my sight!" The demon fled, yet disaster remained imminent. —Ville de l'Amour, A Parting
Ginger, Accursed Word.name: Ginger, Accursed Word
Ginger, Accursed Word.baseEffect: During your turn, whenever an allied follower evolves, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.----------Fanfare: Put a Ginger's Curse into your hand.
Ginger, Accursed Word.evoEffect: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - At the start of your turn, put a Ginger's Curse into your hand. (This effect is not stackable.)

Final Curse.name: Final Curse
Final Curse.baseEffect: Deal 8 damage to an enemy follower.

Flame Destroyer.baseFlair: Come hither and hearken well. The sound of my shackles shattering heralds the beginning of the end.
Flame Destroyer.evoFlair: With rebirth comes metamorphosis. Pity none shall be left to see it once my rapturous flames have scorched this earth.
Flame Destroyer.name: Flame Destroyer
Flame Destroyer.baseEffect: Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.

Clarke, Knowledge Seeker.baseFlair: The unknown exists within the known. How long has it been since I last set foot in this land? One must consider the past to uncover the future... And as I am now, I am confident that I am capable of doing just that.
Clarke, Knowledge Seeker.evoFlair: By refining the known, one can discover the unknown. The quest for knowledge is never-ending. Constant effort will yield success.
Clarke, Knowledge Seeker.name: Clarke, Knowledge Seeker
Clarke, Knowledge Seeker.baseEffect: Accelerate (2): Summon an Earth Essence. Put a Veridic Ritual into your hand.----------Fanfare: Recover 10 play points.Fanfare: Earth Rite - Banish all cards in your hand, then draw 9 cards.

Kuon, Founder of Onmyodo.baseFlair: A noisy crowd of people is worth less than the sum of its parts. Those things you call "knowledge" and "wisdom" are destined to fade away like the morning dew. (What a waste of time. How about we end this?)I command the five elements. (You're finished.)
Kuon, Founder of Onmyodo.evoFlair: (You crowd together like that to study?)(Everything you've learned is worthless.)(What a waste of time. How about we end this?)I command the five elements. (You're finished.)
Kuon, Founder of Onmyodo.name: Kuon, Founder of Onmyodo
Kuon, Founder of Onmyodo.baseEffect: Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.----------Fanfare: Summon a Celestial Shikigami, Demonic Shikigami, and Paper Shikigami.Whenever an allied Demonic Shikigami or Paper Shikigami comes into play, give it Storm.
Kuon, Founder of Onmyodo.evoEffect: Whenever an allied Demonic Shikigami or Paper Shikigami comes into play, give it Storm.

Regalore, Steel Chimera.baseFlair: After they saw their creation shake the earth, call the rain, stoke new fire, and summon old wind, the machinists rejoiced. They had created a being that could subjugate nature itself—never mind the magical perversion it left in its wake to do so.
Regalore, Steel Chimera.evoFlair: Gaian crown, aquan claws, flamen tail, aeroan horns... It's composed of the same elements as we. To pervert creation is folly, and I shall teach you of your ignorance, foolish cretins.—Uhlein, Grand Magus
Regalore, Steel Chimera.name: Regalore, Steel Chimera
Regalore, Steel Chimera.baseEffect: Fusion: MachinaFor each card fused to this follower, subtract 2 from its cost.---------- Ward.Fanfare: Return all allied Machina followers (excluding Regalore, Steel Chimera) to your hand. Summon an Assembly Droid for each follower returned to your hand. Then, give all allied Assembly Droids +X/+X and Rush. X equals half the number of cards fused to this card rounded up.

Prophetess of Creation.baseFlair: By the light of the first star descended a second revelation: Come it thrice or four times again, judge not man's oft-repeated folly. Give naught but as oft-repeated forgiveness. The prophetess bowed her head, pledging her five senses to the gods.
Prophetess of Creation.evoFlair: On the gods' six-sided checkerboard, she was the seventh piece. Buffeted by the advent of eight disasters, movements of rival players, she wove her way around the board guided by the flickering light of nine planets. Reaching the other side at last, she was kinged tenfold.
Prophetess of Creation.name: Prophetess of Creation
Prophetess of Creation.baseEffect: Accelerate (10): Draw a card. Put a Prophetess of Creation into your deck. Teo, Prophetess of Creation.baseFlair: By the light of the first star descended a second revelation: Come it thrice or four times again, judge not man's oft-repeated folly. Give naught but as oft-repeated forgiveness. The prophetess bowed her head, pledging her five senses to the gods.
Teo, Prophetess of Creation.evoFlair: On the gods' six-sided checkerboard, she was the seventh piece. Buffeted by the advent of eight disasters, movements of rival players, she wove her way around the board guided by the flickering light of nine planets. Reaching the other side at last, she was kinged tenfold.
